the belief that something is true or correct

sentences.english: He crept back up the stairs, trying to avoid the ones that creaked.
sentences.chinese: 他蹑手蹑脚地回楼上，尽量避开那些嘎吱作响的梯级。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爬行；蔓延；慢慢地移动；起鸡皮疙瘩
detailed_translations.english: if something such as an insect, small animal, or car creeps, it moves slowly and quietly

detailed_translations.chinese: 爬行；毛骨悚然的感觉；谄媚者

sentences.english: The plane crashed, killing two of the crew and four passengers.
sentences.chinese: 飞机坠毁，造成两名机组人员和四名乘客死亡。

sentences.english: a crew member
sentences.chinese: 一名机组人员

detailed_translations.english: all the people who work on a ship or plane

name: criminal
trans: n.罪犯  adj.犯罪的，刑事上的

sentences.english: Experts cannot agree on the causes of criminal behaviour .
sentences.chinese: 专家对犯罪行为的原因不能取得一致意见。

sentences.english: I was sure he was involved in some kind of criminal activity .
sentences.chinese: 我肯定他在从事某种犯罪活动。

sentences.english: She has not committed a criminal offence (= a crime ) .
sentences.chinese: 她没有犯罪。

sentences.english: He was arrested and charged with criminal damage (= damaging someone’s property illegally ) .
sentences.chinese: 他遭到逮捕并被指控犯有刑事损坏罪。

sentences.english: The doctor was found guilty of criminal negligence (= not taking enough care to protect people you are responsible for ) .
sentences.chinese: 这名医生被判过失犯罪。

detailed_translations.english: relating to crime
someone who is involved in illegal activities or has been proved guilty of a crime

sentences.english: We moved here because there was very little crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们搬到这里来是因为这里的犯罪率很低。

sentences.english: Police officers are being given new powers to help combat crime.
sentences.chinese: 警官们被赋予新的权力帮助他们打击犯罪。

sentences.english: a police crackdown on car crime
sentences.chinese: 警察对汽车犯罪活动的一次严厉打击

sentences.english: a town with a relatively low crime rate
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率相对较低的一个城镇

detailed_translations.english: illegal activities in general

name: critical
trans: adj.批评的，评论(性) 的；危急的

sentences.english: He made some highly critical remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他发表了一些严厉的批判性言论。

detailed_translations.english: if you are critical, you criticize someone or something

sentences.english: Despite strong criticism , the new system is still in place.
sentences.chinese: 尽管遭到了猛烈的批评，新制度依然原封不动。

sentences.english: There has been widespread criticism of the decision.
sentences.chinese: 这一决定受到了普遍的批评。

sentences.english: We try to give students constructive criticism .
sentences.chinese: 我们设法对学生提出有建设性的批评。

sentences.english: Another criticism levelled at him was that his teaching methods were old-fashioned.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个针对他的批评是，他的教学方法已经过时。

sentences.english: The government’s economic strategy has attracted a lot of criticism .
sentences.chinese: 政府的经济政策招致了大量的批评。

sentences.english: You must learn to accept criticism .
sentences.chinese: 你必须学会接受批评。

sentences.english: Many employees find it hard to take even mild criticism .
sentences.chinese: 有许多员工甚至连轻微的批评也很难接受。

sentences.english: His actions provoked severe criticism from civil rights groups.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为招致了民权组织的严厉批评。

sentences.english: the storm of criticism that followed his announcement
sentences.chinese: 他的声明引来的批评浪潮

sentences.english: literary criticism
sentences.chinese: 文学评论

detailed_translations.english: remarks that say what you think is bad about someone or something

name: cross
trans: v.穿过,越过；(使)交叉,(使)相交

sentences.english: The by-pass crosses Wilton Lane shortly after a roundabout.
sentences.chinese: 这条旁道绕过环岛后不久就和威尔顿巷相交。

detailed_translations.chinese: 交叉，十字；十字架，十字形物
detailed_translations.english: an upright post of wood with another crossing it near the top, that people in the past were fastened to with nails and left to die on as a punishment
if two or more roads, lines, etc cross, or if one crosses another, they go across each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 交叉的，相反的；乖戾的；生气的
detailed_translations.english: angry or annoyed

name: crowd
trans: n.人群；群众 v.拥挤；挤满

sentences.english: A vast crowd gathered in the main square.
sentences.chinese: 主广场上聚集了一大群人。

sentences.english: She mingled with the crowd of guests, exchanging greetings.
sentences.chinese: 她穿梭在宾客中间和他们打招呼。

sentences.english: Saturday’s game was watched by a capacity crowd (= the maximum number of people that a sports ground etc can hold ) .
sentences.chinese: 星期六的比赛座无虚席。

sentences.english: Troops fired tear gas and shots to disperse a crowd of 15,000 demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 军队发射催泪弹并开枪来驱散15,000名示威群众。

sentences.english: I didn’t know him; he wasn’t one of the usual crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我不认识他，他不是平时那一群人里的。

sentences.english: He wanted to go unnoticed, to be one of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他想默默无闻地做个普通人。

detailed_translations.english: a large group of people who have gathered together to do something, for example to watch something or protest about something

name: crown
trans: n.王冠,冕；君权 v.为...加冕；立...为王

sentences.english: a hat with a high crown
sentences.chinese: 高顶帽

detailed_translations.english: the top part of a hat or someone’s head
to place a crown on the head of a new king or queen as part of an official ceremony in which they become king or queen

sentences.english: The conservation of tropical forests is of crucial importance .
sentences.chinese: 保护热带雨林至关重要。

detailed_translations.english: something that is crucial is extremely important, because everything else depends on it

name: cry
trans: v.哭，哭泣；叫喊 n.哭，哭声；叫喊，喊声

sentences.english: Don’t cry, Laura. It’ll be OK.
sentences.chinese: 不要哭，劳拉，没事的。

sentences.english: Upstairs, a baby began to cry.
sentences.chinese: 楼上有个婴儿开始哭起来。

sentences.english: Jamie looked like he’d been crying.
sentences.chinese: 杰米看上去好像哭过了。

sentences.english: I just couldn’t stop crying.
sentences.chinese: 我就是哭个不停。

sentences.english: That film always makes me cry .
sentences.chinese: 那部影片总是让我落泪。

sentences.english: Oliver, alone, began to cry bitterly (= cry a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 奥利弗独自一人，开始伤心地哭了。

sentences.english: ‘Stop!’ she cried.
sentences.chinese: “停下！”她喊道。

detailed_translations.english: to produce tears from your eyes, usually because you are unhappy or hurt

name: cultivate
trans: v.耕作，栽培，养殖；培养，教养

sentences.english: We cultivated maize and watermelons.
sentences.chinese: 我们种植玉米和西瓜。

detailed_translations.english: to plant and take care of a particular crop

sentences.english: We speak Danish at home so that the boys don’t lose touch with their language and culture.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.english: In our culture, it is rude to ask someone how much they earn.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

sentences.english: I love working abroad and meeting people from diffe-rent cultures.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在国外工作，认识来自不同文化的人。

detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

sentences.english: Mathew picked up the cup and sipped his coffee.
sentences.chinese: 马修拿起杯子抿了口咖啡。

sentences.english: She put her cup and saucer down on the table.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯碟放到桌上。

sentences.english: Breakfast consisted of half a cup of milk and a dry biscuit.
sentences.chinese: 早餐是半杯牛奶和一片干饼干。

sentences.english: The president of the club came to present the cup to the winners.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部主席来给获胜者颁发奖杯。

detailed_translations.english: a small round container, usually with a handle, that you use to drink tea, coffee etc

sentences.english: It’s in the kitchen cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 它在厨房的碗柜里。

sentences.english: The cupboard doors were open.
sentences.chinese: 柜门开着。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with doors, and sometimes shelves, used for storing clothes, plates, food etc

name: cure
trans: v.治疗，治好；纠正，矫正 n.疗，治愈；疗法，良药

sentences.english: Will you be able to cure him, Doctor?
sentences.chinese: 医生，你能把他治好吗？

sentences.english: The new treatment effected a miraculous cure.
sentences.chinese: 这种新疗法产生了奇迹般的疗效。

detailed_translations.english: to make a person or an animal healthy again after an illness
the act of making someone well again after an illness

sentences.english: Puppies are naturally curious.
sentences.chinese: 小狗天生好奇。

sentences.english: He felt a curious mixture of excitement and panic.
sentences.chinese: 他有一种既兴奋又惊慌的奇怪感觉。

detailed_translations.english: wanting to know about something

sentences.english: the current President
sentences.chinese: 现任总统

sentences.english: In its current state, the car is worth £1,000.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车按现在的车况来看值1,000英镑。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing now

sentences.english: We aim to offer good value and service to all our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们力求为所有的客户提供物有所值的商品和服务。

sentences.english: We’ve had several letters from satisfied customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了几封顾客表示满意的来信。

sentences.english: He’s one of our regular customers .
sentences.chinese: 他是我们的一个老主顾。

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys goods or services from a shop, company etc

sentences.english: Do you want me to cut the cake?
sentences.chinese: 要我切蛋糕吗？

sentences.english: They’re introducing CCTV cameras in an attempt to cut street crime in the area.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少该地区的街头犯罪，他们安装了闭路电视摄像机。

sentences.english: You need to cut the amount of fat and sugar in your diet.
sentences.chinese: 你需要减少饮食中脂肪和糖的摄入量。

sentences.english: Scientists are warning that unless carbon emissions are cut, we could be heading for an environmental catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 科学家警告说如果不减少碳排放量，我们可能会面临环境灾难。

sentences.english: Seven hundred jobs will be lost in order to cut costs and boost profits.
sentences.chinese: 为了降低成本，提高利润，将削减700个职位。

sentences.english: The major aviation companies need to cut prices if they are to compete with budget airlines.
sentences.chinese: 大航空公司如果想和廉价的航空公司竞争，就需要降低价格。

sentences.english: Staffing levels had already been cut to the bone (= reduced to the lowest level possible ) .
sentences.chinese: 人员配备已经削减到了最低限度。

detailed_translations.english: to divide something or separate something from its main part, using scissors, a knife etc

sentences.english: daily flights to Miami
sentences.chinese: 每日飞往迈阿密的航班

sentences.english: China Daily receives dispatches from all parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 《中国日报》收到世界各地发来的电讯。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done every day
a newspaper that is printed and sold every day, or every day except Sunday

sentences.english: laws about dangerous dogs
sentences.chinese: 有关危险犬类的法律

sentences.english: Some of these prisoners are extremely dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 这些囚犯中有些极为危险。

sentences.english: The powdered milk was not as good as breast milk, and was downright dangerous (= actually dangerous ) when it was mixed with unclean water.
sentences.chinese: 奶粉没有母乳好，用不洁净的水冲调更会造成危险。

detailed_translations.english: able or likely to harm or kill you

sentences.english: Danger! No boats beyond this point.
sentences.chinese: 危险！船只不可越过此处。

sentences.english: The refugees believe that their lives are in danger .
sentences.chinese: 难民认为他们有生命危险。

detailed_translations.english: the possibility that someone or something will be harmed, destroyed, or killed

sentences.english: He wanted to ask her, but he didn’t dare.
sentences.chinese: 他想问她，但又不敢。

sentences.english: ‘I’ll tell Dad.’ ‘You wouldn’t dare!’
sentences.chinese: “我要告诉爸爸。” “谅你也不敢！”

sentences.english: How dare you accuse me of lying!
sentences.chinese: 你竟敢说我撒谎！

detailed_translations.english: to be brave enough to do something that is risky or that you are afraid to do – used especially in questions or negative sentences

sentences.english: The church was dark and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 教堂里黑魆魆的，寂静无声。

sentences.english: the dark winter days
sentences.chinese: 阴暗的冬日

sentences.english: Suddenly, the room went dark (= became dark ) .
sentences.chinese: 房间突然变暗了。

sentences.english: (= night begins ) about ten o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 大约十点钟开始天黑。

sentences.english: It was still dark (= was night ) when we boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 我们上火车时天还是黑的。

sentences.english: It was pitch dark (= completely dark ) in the attic.
sentences.chinese: 阁楼上漆黑一片。

detailed_translations.english: if it is dark, there is little or no light

sentences.english: The date on the letter was 30th August 1962.
sentences.chinese: 信上的日期是1962年8月30日。

sentences.english: What’s today’s date?
sentences.chinese: 今天几号？

sentences.english: Make sure you sign and date it at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在底下签上姓名和日期。

detailed_translations.english: a particular day of the month or year, especially shown by a number
to write or print the date on something

sentences.english: She’s got two daughters and one son.
sentences.chinese: 她有两个女儿和一个儿子。

sentences.english: our eldest daughter
sentences.chinese: 我们的长女

detailed_translations.english: someone’s female child

sentences.english: We spent three days in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我们在巴黎度过了三天。

sentences.english: She only leaves her house during the day.
sentences.chinese: 她只在白天出门。

sentences.english: It was a cold blustery day.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒风呼啸的冷天。

sentences.english: Kept in that dark cell, I could no longer tell whether it was day or night.
sentences.chinese: 我被关在那个漆黑的牢房里，不知是白天还是黑夜。

sentences.english: The day dawned (= started ) bright and clear.
sentences.chinese: 拂晓时天朗气清。

detailed_translations.english: a period of 24 hours

name: deal
trans: n.交易 v.给予，分给；交易

sentences.english: The prime minister promised farmers a new deal (= a new and fairer system ) .
sentences.chinese: 首相向农民保证推行一项新政策。

detailed_translations.english: treatment of a particular type that is given or received

sentences.english: Dear Sir or Madam, ...
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的先生或女士，…

sentences.english: Dear Mrs. Wilson, ...
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的威尔逊夫人，…

sentences.english: Dear Meg, ...
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的梅格，…

sentences.english: You're a lot like me, dear.
sentences.chinese: 你和我太像了，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.english: used before someone’s name or title to begin a letter
You can call someone dear as a sign of affection

sentences.english: 1.5 million people are in immediate danger of death from starvation.
sentences.chinese: 150万人正因饥饿而即将面临死亡的危险。

detailed_translations.english: a creature that looks like a human  skeleton  , used in paintings, stories etc to represent the fact that people die

sentences.english: He died in 1985 at the age of 76.
sentences.chinese: 他1985年去世，终年76岁。

sentences.english: Her father died suddenly in an accident when she was only ten.
sentences.chinese: 她年仅10岁时父亲突然死于一场意外事故。

sentences.english: She died peacefully in her sleep at the age of 98.
sentences.chinese: 她在睡眠中安然辞世，享年98岁。

sentences.english: The bullet went straight through his head, and he died instantly.
sentences.chinese: 子弹穿过他的头部，他当场死亡。

sentences.english: Our love will never die.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱始终不渝。

detailed_translations.english: to stop living and become dead

sentences.english: It was her dying wish to have a simple burial.
sentences.chinese: 她的临终遗愿是办个简朴的葬礼。

detailed_translations.english: happening just before someone dies

sentences.english: the gun-control debate in the US
sentences.chinese: 美国有关控制枪支的争论

sentences.english: The new drug has become the subject of heated debate within the medical profession.
sentences.chinese: 这种新药成了医学界激烈争论的话题。

sentences.english: There was much lively debate about whether women should spend more time in the home.
sentences.chinese: 就妇女是否应该花更多时间待在家里这个话题有许多热烈的争论。

sentences.english: A fierce debate raged over which artist’s work should be chosen for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 就哪位艺术家的作品应该得奖一事展开了激烈的争论。

sentences.english: The issue will be debated on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在星期二讨论。

detailed_translations.english: discussion of a particular subject that often continues for a long time and in which people express different opinions
to discuss a subject formally when you are trying to make a decision or find a solution

sentences.english: He had enough money to pay off his outstanding debts.
sentences.chinese: 他有足够的钱偿还亏欠的债务。

sentences.english: students who run up huge debts
sentences.chinese: 欠下巨额债务的学生

detailed_translations.english: a sum of money that a person or organization owes

sentences.english: ...the last decade of the nineteenth century.
sentences.chinese: …19世纪的最后10年。

detailed_translations.english: a period of 10 years

sentences.english: He had been deceived by a young man claiming to be the son of a millionaire.
sentences.chinese: 他被一个自称是百万富翁之子的年轻人骗了。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone believe something that is not true
to make someone believe something that is not true

sentences.english: Has anything been decided yet?
sentences.chinese: 已经作出什么决定了吗？

sentences.english: The trainees decide among themselves what programs to take.
sentences.chinese: 受训者自行选择课程。

sentences.english: After a long discussion, they decided in favour of (= chose ) the older applicant.
sentences.chinese: 经过长时间的讨论，他们决定选那位较年长的求职者。

detailed_translations.english: to make a choice or judgment about something, especially after considering all the possibilities or arguments

sentences.english: Do you ever wonder if you made the right decision?
sentences.chinese: 你怀疑过自己所作的决定是否正确吗？

sentences.english: The judges’ decision is final (= it will not be changed ).
sentences.chinese: 法官的裁决是最终判决。

sentences.english: the ability to act with speed and decision
sentences.chinese: 处事迅速果断的能力

detailed_translations.english: a choice or judgment that you make after a period of discussion or thought

name: decline
trans: n.谢绝；下降，衰落；斜面 v.下降，下垂，衰落；拒绝，谢绝

sentences.english: Offered the position of chairman, Smith declined, preferring to keep his current job.
sentences.chinese: 对担任主席的邀约，史密斯拒绝了，他宁愿留在现在的职位上。

sentences.english: Mary declined a hot drink and went to her room.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽谢绝了热饮料，到自己的房间去了。

sentences.english: The minister declined to comment (= refused to speak to people who report the news ) about the progress of the peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 部长拒绝就和谈进程发表评论。

detailed_translations.english: to say no politely when someone invites you somewhere, offers you something, or wants you to do something

sentences.english: The bathroom is decorated in green and yellow.
sentences.chinese: 浴室里是用绿色和黄色装潢的。

sentences.english: We plan to spend the weekend decorating.
sentences.chinese: 我们计划用这个周末来装修。

detailed_translations.english: to paint the inside of a room, put special paper on the walls etc

sentences.english: The number of people who have the disease has decreased significantly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，这种病的患者人数明显下降。

sentences.english: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.chinese: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

sentences.english: There has been a steady decrease of temperature.
sentences.chinese: 气温在持续下降。

detailed_translations.english: to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
the process of becoming less, or the amount by which something becomes less

sentences.english: The actress now dedicates herself to children’s charity work.
sentences.chinese: 这名女演员现在致力于儿童慈善工作。

detailed_translations.english: to give all your attention and effort to one particular thing

sentences.english: French and German were deemed essential.
sentences.chinese: 法语和德语被认为是必需的。

detailed_translations.english: to think of something in a particular way or as having a particular quality

name: deep
trans: adj.深的；深切的 adv.深深地

sentences.english: a deep narrow valley
sentences.chinese: 又深又窄的山谷

sentences.english: a deep wound
sentences.chinese: 很深的伤口

sentences.english: She was sitting in a deep leather chair.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在一张很深的皮椅子里。

detailed_translations.english: going far down from the top or from the surface

sentences.english: They hoped to defeat the enemy at sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们希望在海上击败敌人。

sentences.english: She was a woman who hated to admit defeat.
sentences.chinese: 她是个不愿认输的女人。

detailed_translations.english: to win a victory over someone in a war, competition, game etc
failure to win or succeed

sentences.english: It’s impossible for me to give you a definite answer.
sentences.chinese: 我不可能给你明确的答复。

sentences.english: We need to record sufficient data to enable definite conclusions to be reached.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要记录足够的数据，才能得出明确的结论。

sentences.english: He’d shown definite signs of resigning himself to the situation.
sentences.chinese: 他明显表现出安于这种状况的样子。

sentences.english: Fix a definite date for the delivery of your computer.
sentences.chinese: 请为你的电脑定个确切的交货日期。

detailed_translations.english: clearly known, seen, or stated

sentences.english: Newspapers vary in the degree to which they emphasize propaganda rather than information.
sentences.chinese: 报纸重宣传轻资讯的程度各不相同。

detailed_translations.english: the level or amount of something

sentences.english: ‘The meal was absolutely delicious,’ she said politely.
sentences.chinese: “这顿饭味道好极了。” 她礼貌地说道。

sentences.english: the delicious smell of new-mown grass
sentences.chinese: 新修剪的草坪的芳香

detailed_translations.english: very pleasant to taste or smell

sentences.english: The morning mail has just been delivered.
sentences.chinese: 早晨的邮件刚送到。

sentences.english: Do you deliver on Saturdays?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你们送货吗？

sentences.english: I’m having some flowers delivered for her birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我在安排人给她送花祝贺生日。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, letters, packages etc to a particular place or person

name: demand
trans: v.要求，强令；需要；询问，查问 n.要求；需要，需求(量)

sentences.english: Angry demonstrators demanded the resignation of two senior officials.
sentences.chinese: 愤怒的示威者要求两名高级官员辞职。

sentences.english: ‘Where are you going?’ she demanded angrily.
sentences.chinese: “你要去哪里？” 她气愤地质问道。

detailed_translations.english: to ask for something very firmly, especially because you think you have a right to do this
the need or desire that people have for particular goods and services

sentences.english: a democratic government
sentences.chinese: 民主政府

sentences.english: the role of the media in the democratic process
sentences.chinese: 民主进程中媒体的作用

detailed_translations.english: controlled by representatives who are elected by the people of a country

sentences.english: a return to democracy after 16 years of military rule
sentences.chinese: 16年军人统治后民主制度的恢复

detailed_translations.english: a system of government in which every citizen in the country can vote to elect its government officials

sentences.english: areas of high population density
sentences.chinese: 人口密度高的地区

detailed_translations.english: the degree to which an area is filled with people or things

sentences.english: Visit your dentist twice a year for a checkup.
sentences.chinese: 每年看两次牙医做检查。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to treat people’s teeth

sentences.english: The government denied the existence of poverty among 16- and 17-year-olds.
sentences.chinese: 政府否认十六七岁的青少年当中存在贫困问题。

detailed_translations.english: to say that something is not true, or that you do not believe something

sentences.english: the personnel department
sentences.chinese: 人事部

sentences.english: the English department
sentences.chinese: 英语系

detailed_translations.english: one of the groups of people who work together in a particular part of a large organization such as a hospital, university, company, or government

name: depend
trans: v.(on, upon) 依靠，依赖；决定于

sentences.english: He depended on his writing for his income.
sentences.chinese: 他靠写作谋生。

sentences.english: You can depend on Jane – she always keeps her promises.
sentences.chinese: 你可以相信简——她一向都信守诺言。

detailed_translations.english: to need the support, help, or existence of someone or something in order to exist, be healthy, be successful etc

sentences.english: Mr. Ying is one of those happy people who derive pleasure from helping others.
sentences.chinese: 英先生是那种助人为乐的快活人。

detailed_translations.english: to get something, especially an advantage or a pleasant feeling, from something
to develop or come from something else

sentences.english: The police asked her to describe the man.
sentences.chinese: 警察叫她描述一下那名男子。

sentences.english: Another approach to the problem is described in Chapter 3.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题的另一种解决方法在第三章有所阐述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 形容， 描写； 画出
detailed_translations.english: to say what something or someone is like by giving details about them

sentences.english: The booklet gives a brief description of each place.
sentences.chinese: 这本小册子对每一个地方都作了简短的介绍。

sentences.english: Berlin sounds fascinating from your description.
sentences.chinese: 从你的描述来看，柏林是个迷人的城市。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or speech that gives details about what someone or something is like

sentences.english: What have I done to deserve this?
sentences.chinese: 我做了什么事，要得到这样的报应？

sentences.english: I’m sorry for the kids. They deserve better (= deserve to be treated in a better way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我为这些孩子感到难过，他们应该过得更好。

sentences.english: Ledley deserves a place in the team.
sentences.chinese: 莱德利应该在队里占有一席之地。

sentences.english: Paula deserves a special mention for all the help she has given us.
sentences.chinese: 应该特别提一下葆拉，她给了我们许多帮助。

sentences.english: I would never hit anyone, even if they deserved it.
sentences.chinese: 我决不会打人，哪怕他欠揍。

sentences.english: What has he done to deserve this punishment ?
sentences.chinese: 他做了什么，竟会受到这样的惩罚？

sentences.english: People who are sent to prison for drunk-driving get what they deserve .
sentences.chinese: 那些醉酒驾车被送进监狱的人是罪有应得的。

detailed_translations.english: to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour

name: design
trans: v.设计,计划 n.设计,图样

sentences.english: The tower was designed by Gilbert Scott.
sentences.chinese: 这座塔楼是吉尔伯特·斯科特设计的。

detailed_translations.english: to make a drawing or plan of something that will be made or built

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计， 构想； 图样； 企图
detailed_translations.english: the art or process of making a drawing of something to show how you will make it or what it will look like

name: desire
trans: v.愿望，渴望；要求 n.愿望，欲望

sentences.english: The hotel has everything you could possibly desire .
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店里你想要的东西应有尽有。

sentences.english: Add lemon juice if desired .
sentences.chinese: 需要的话加点柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much
a strong hope or wish

sentences.english: The ability to speak a foreign language is highly desirable .
sentences.chinese: 能说一门外语是非常理想的。

sentences.english: a desirable neighborhood
sentences.chinese: 理想的社区

sentences.english: It is desirable that you should have some familiarity with computers.
sentences.chinese: 应该对电脑有所熟悉，这是很有益处的。

sentences.english: It is desirable to keep the cost as low as possible.
sentences.chinese: 把成本控制得越低越好。

detailed_translations.english: something that is desirable is worth having or doing

name: despite
trans: prep.不管，不顾；尽管 n.憎恨，轻蔑

sentences.english: Despite all our efforts to save the school, the authorities decided to close it.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我们竭力想保住这所学校，当局还是决定把它关闭。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something happens or is true even though something else might have prevented it

sentences.english: Ellis Island has become one of America's most popular tourist destinations.
sentences.chinese: 埃利斯岛已经成为美国最受欢迎的游览地之一。

detailed_translations.english: the place that someone or something is going to

sentences.english: Nancy wondered whether it was her destiny to live in England and marry Melvyn.
sentences.chinese: 南希想知道她生活在英格兰又嫁给梅尔文是不是命运的安排。

sentences.english: We are masters of our own destiny.
sentences.chinese: 我们是自己命运的主人。

detailed_translations.english: the things that will happen to someone in the future, especially those that cannot be changed or controlled

name: destroy
trans: v.破坏,摧毁;消灭,扑灭;打破,粉碎

sentences.english: companies that are polluting and destroying the environment
sentences.chinese: 污染和破坏环境的公司

detailed_translations.english: to damage something so badly that it no longer exists or cannot be used or repaired

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["weapons of mass destruction"]}
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the environmental destruction caused by the road building programme
sentences.chinese: 筑路工程造成的环境破坏

sentences.english: The floods brought death and destruction to the area.
sentences.chinese: 洪水给该地区带来了死亡和破坏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 破坏， 毁灭； 消灭
detailed_translations.english: the act or process of destroying something or of being destroyed

name: detail
trans: v.详细讲述，详谈 n.详细的情况，细节；枝节，琐碎

sentences.english: This issue will be discussed in more detail in Chapter 5.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在第五章里作更为详细的论述。

detailed_translations.english: a single feature, fact, or piece of information about something
to list things or give all the facts or information about something

sentences.english: Investigators are still trying to determine the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 调查人员仍在设法弄清失火的原因。

detailed_translations.english: to find out the facts about something

sentences.english: Knowledge in the field of genetics has been developing very rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 遗传学领域的知识发展非常迅速。

sentences.english: Corsica has developed its economy around the tourist industry.
sentences.chinese: 科西嘉岛的经济是围绕旅游业发展起来的。

sentences.english: exercises to develop muscle strength
sentences.chinese: 锻炼肌肉力量的运动

sentences.english: He had developed a certain affection for me.
sentences.chinese: 他对我产生了一些好感。

sentences.english: The land was developed for low-cost housing.
sentences.chinese: 这块土地被开发建造廉价住宅。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually grow or become bigger, more advanced, stronger, etc.; to make sth do this

sentences.english: child development
sentences.chinese: 儿童发育

sentences.english: The funds will be used for marketing and product development.
sentences.chinese: 这笔资金将用于市场营销和产品开发。

detailed_translations.english: the process of gradually becoming bigger, better, stronger, or more advanced

name: device
trans: n.装置，设备，仪表；方法，设计

sentences.english: modern labour-saving devices
sentences.chinese: 省力的现代设备

detailed_translations.chinese: 器械， 装置； 设计； 手段， 策略
detailed_translations.english: a machine or tool that does a special job

sentences.english: The lighted dial of her watch said 1.20.
sentences.chinese: 她手表上的夜光表面显示时间为1点20分。

sentences.english: I think I dialed the wrong number.
sentences.chinese: 我想我拨错号码了。

detailed_translations.english: the round part of a clock, watch, machine etc that has numbers that show you the time or a measurement
to press the buttons or turn the dial on a telephone in order to make a telephone call

sentences.english: a boring movie full of bad dialog
sentences.chinese: 充满差劲对白的乏味电影

sentences.english: Students were asked to read simple dialogues out loud.
sentences.chinese: 学生被要求大声朗读简单的对话。

detailed_translations.english: a conversation in a book, play, or film

sentences.english: a German-English dictionary
sentences.chinese: 一本德英词典

detailed_translations.english: a book that gives a list of words in alphabetical order and explains their meanings in the same language, or another language

sentences.english: She doesn’t eat a very healthy diet.
sentences.chinese: 她的饮食不是很健康。

sentences.english: It is important to have a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 饮食均衡很重要。

sentences.english: Rice is the staple diet (= the main food that a group of people usually eat ) .
sentences.chinese: 大米是主食。

detailed_translations.english: the kind of food that a person or animal eats each day

sentences.english: The place looks completely different now.
sentences.chinese: 这地方现在完全变了。

sentences.english: They decided to try a radically different approach.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.english: We found women had significantly different political views from men.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现女性的政治观点与男性大不相同。

sentences.english: a slightly different way of doing things
sentences.chinese: 稍有区别的做事方法

sentences.english: What actually happened was subtly different from the PR people’s version.
sentences.chinese: 实际情况与公关部那些人的说法有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The show is refreshingly different from most exhibitions of modern art.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览与大多数现代艺术展不一样，令人耳目一新。

sentences.english: The publishing business is no different from any other business in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 从这一点来讲，出版业和其他任何行业没有什么差别。

sentences.english: It’s a different world here in London.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦这儿的情况完全不同。

detailed_translations.english: not like something or someone else, or not like before

sentences.english: There’s a big difference between knowing that something is true, and being able to prove it.
sentences.chinese: 知道什么正确与能够证明它正确，这之间有很大的不同。

sentences.english: There's not much difference in price between the two computers.
sentences.chinese: 这两种计算机价格上没有多大的差别。

sentences.english: We have our differences , but she's still my sister.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间虽然不和，但她仍旧是我的妹妹。

detailed_translations.english: a way in which two or more people or things are not like each other

name: differ
trans: v.(from) 与...不同 (with) 与...意见不同

sentences.english: The two systems differ in many respects.
sentences.chinese: 这两个系统在许多方面不同。

sentences.english: Experts have differing views on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 在这个问题上专家们意见不同。

detailed_translations.english: to be different from something in some way

sentences.english: a difficult question
sentences.chinese: 难解的问题

sentences.english: an immensely difficult task
sentences.chinese: 极为艰巨的任务

sentences.english: Was the exam very difficult?
sentences.chinese: 这次考试很难吗？

sentences.english: It’s difficult to see how more savings can be made.
sentences.chinese: 想要进一步节约看来是很难了。

sentences.english: Don’t be so difficult!
sentences.chinese: 别这么挑剔！

detailed_translations.english: hard to do, understand, or deal with

sentences.english: Dig down about 6 inches.
sentences.chinese: 往下挖大约六英寸深。

detailed_translations.english: to move earth, snow etc, or to make a hole in the ground, using a spade or your hands

sentences.english: digital TV
sentences.chinese: 数字电视

sentences.english: a digital signal
sentences.chinese: 数字信号

sentences.english: a digital camera
sentences.chinese: 数码照相机

sentences.english: digital recording
sentences.chinese: 数字录音

detailed_translations.english: using a system in which information is recorded or sent out electronically in the form of numbers, usually ones and zeros

sentences.english: What time do you usually have dinner?
sentences.chinese: 你通常什么时候吃饭？

sentences.english: We’re having fish for dinner tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天晚饭吃鱼。

sentences.english: What’s for dinner?
sentences.chinese: 晚饭吃什么？

sentences.english: the Club’s annual dinner
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的年度晚宴

detailed_translations.english: the main meal of the day, eaten in the middle of the day or the evening

sentences.english: Dip each apple in the syrup until thickly coated.
sentences.chinese: 把每个苹果在糖浆里蘸一下，直到被厚厚地裹上糖浆。

detailed_translations.english: to put something into a liquid and lift it out again
to put something into a liquid and lift it out again

name: direct
trans: adj.直的；率直的  adv.直接地；坦率地

sentences.english: Experienced users have direct access to the main data files.
sentences.chinese: 高级用户可直接浏览主数据文档。

sentences.english: I’m not in direct contact with them.
sentences.chinese: 我和他们没有直接的联系。

sentences.english: Few policy-makers have had direct experience of business.
sentences.chinese: 决策者几乎都没有直接的从商经历。

sentences.english: Women often feel men are too direct and not sympathetic enough.
sentences.chinese: 女人常常觉得男人太直率，不够体贴。

detailed_translations.english: done without any other people, actions, processes etc coming between

sentences.english: The new property tax law won’t directly affect us.
sentences.chinese: 新的财产税法不会直接影响到我们。

sentences.english: We hope to bring together the countries directly involved in the conflict.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望让直接卷入冲突的各国重归于好。

sentences.english: Most guests left directly after the wake.
sentences.chinese: 守灵仪式一结束，大部分客人就立刻走了。

detailed_translations.english: with no other person, action, process etc between

sentences.english: Which direction did they go in ?
sentences.chinese: 他们朝哪个方向走了？

sentences.english: A very helpful woman gave me directions to the police station.
sentences.chinese: 一个很热心的妇女给我指了去警察局的路。

sentences.english: Be sure you read the directions before using any piece of equipment.
sentences.chinese: 使用任何设备之前一定要先阅读操作指南。

detailed_translations.english: the way something or someone moves, faces, or is aimed

sentences.english: a stack of dirty dishes in the sink
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里的一堆脏碟子

sentences.english: How did you get so dirty?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会弄得这么脏？

sentences.english: kids telling dirty jokes
sentences.chinese: 讲着下流笑话的年轻人

sentences.english: a dirty magazine
sentences.chinese: 色情杂志

detailed_translations.english: covered in or marked by an unwanted substance

sentences.english: Criminal behaviour can be linked to economic disadvantage.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为可能会与经济困难有关。

detailed_translations.english: something that causes problems, or that makes someone or something less likely to be successful or effective

name: disagree
trans: v.(with)意见不同;不一致,不同意

sentences.english: Barr strongly disagreed with Kronfeld’s statement.
sentences.chinese: 巴尔强烈反对克龙费尔德的说法。

sentences.english: The statements of several witnesses disagree.
sentences.chinese: 几名证人的证词不一致。

detailed_translations.english: to have or express a different opinion from someone else

sentences.english: At this point the path seemed to disappear altogether (= disappear completely ) .
sentences.chinese: 小路到这里好像完全消失了。

sentences.english: The two girls disappeared while walking home from school..
sentences.chinese: 这两名女孩在放学回家的路上失踪了。

detailed_translations.english: to become impossible to see any longer

sentences.english: I hated to disappoint her.
sentences.chinese: 我不愿意让她失望。

sentences.english: Great things were expected of this band, and they didn’t disappoint.
sentences.chinese: 大家对这支乐队的期望很高，而他们也不负众望。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel unhappy because something they hoped for did not happen or was not as good as they expected

name: discharge
trans: n.卸货，解除；排出，发射；解雇 v.排出，发射；释放，遣散

sentences.english: Sewage is discharged directly into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 污水被直接排放到海里。

sentences.english: the discharge of toxic waste into the sea
sentences.chinese: 有毒废物向海里的排放

detailed_translations.english: to send out gas, liquid, smoke etc, or to allow it to escape
when gas, liquid, smoke etc is sent out, or the substance that is sent out

sentences.english: They are often available at a discount.
sentences.chinese: 它们经常可以以折扣价买到。

sentences.english: This has forced airlines to discount fares heavily in order to spur demand.
sentences.chinese: 这已经迫使多家航空公司对机票大幅打折以刺激需求。

detailed_translations.english: a reduction in the usual price of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…打折扣； 不信； 漠视， 低估
detailed_translations.english: If a shop or company discounts an amount or percentage from something that they are selling, they take the amount or percentage off the usual price

sentences.english: The body was discovered in a field.
sentences.chinese: 尸体是在一块田地里找到的。

sentences.english: Forest Service crews often discover campfires that have not been put out completely.
sentences.chinese: 林务局工作人员常常发现未完全熄灭的营火。

detailed_translations.english: to find someone or something, either by accident or because you were looking for them

sentences.english: the discovery of oil in Alaska
sentences.chinese: 在阿拉斯加发现石油

sentences.english: The Hubble Telescope allowed astronomers to make significant discoveries about our galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃望远镜使天文学家对我们的银河系有了重大发现。

detailed_translations.english: when someone discovers something

sentences.english: Littman refused to discuss the case publicly.
sentences.chinese: 利特曼拒绝公开讨论此案。

sentences.english: If you would like to discuss the matter further, please call me.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想进一步讨论此事，请打电话给我。

sentences.english: This topic will be discussed in Chapter 4.
sentences.chinese: 该主题将在第四章进行详述。

detailed_translations.english: to talk about something with another person or a group in order to exchange ideas or decide something

sentences.english: class discussions
sentences.chinese: 课堂讨论

sentences.english: the topics suggested for discussion
sentences.chinese: 建议讨论的话题

sentences.english: We have had discussions about her legal situation.
sentences.chinese: 我们就她的法律状况已进行了讨论。

detailed_translations.english: when you discuss something

sentences.english: His father died of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲死于心脏病。

sentences.english: She contracted the disease while she was abroad on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

detailed_translations.chinese: 病， 疾病； 不健全， 弊端
detailed_translations.english: an illness which affects a person, animal, or plant

sentences.english: Why do you dislike her so much?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么那么讨厌她？

sentences.english: My dislike of thunder and even small earthquakes was due to Mother.
sentences.chinese: 我对雷声甚至于轻微地震的厌恶都归因于我的母亲。

detailed_translations.english: to think someone or something is unpleasant and not like them
Dislike is the feeling that you do not like someone or something

sentences.english: severe eating disorders such as bulimia and anorexia
sentences.chinese: 像贪食症和厌食症这类严重的进食障碍

detailed_translations.chinese: 混乱， 杂乱， 骚乱
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which a lot of people behave in an uncontrolled, noisy, or violent way in public

sentences.english: Measure the distance between the two points.
sentences.chinese: 量出两点之间的距离。

sentences.english: The cottage is some distance (= quite a long distance ) from the road.
sentences.chinese: 小屋离开大路有些距离。

sentences.english: Church bells rang in the distance (= they were far away ) .
sentences.chinese: 远处教堂的钟声响起。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of space between two places or things

name: distinct
trans: adj.清楚的,明显的；不同的,独特的

sentences.english: The outline of the ship became more distinct.
sentences.chinese: 船的轮廓变得更加清晰了。

detailed_translations.english: easily or clearly heard, seen, felt, etc.

sentences.english: The factor that distinguishes this company from the competition is customer service.
sentences.chinese: 使这家公司在竞争中脱颖而出的是其客户服务。

sentences.english: The main distinguishing feature of this species is the leaf shape.
sentences.chinese: 这一品种的主要特征是叶子的形状。

detailed_translations.english: to be the thing that makes someone or something different or special

sentences.english: There are obvious distinctions between the two wine-making areas.
sentences.chinese: 这两个酿酒区之间有明显的不同。

detailed_translations.english: a clear difference or separation between two similar things

sentences.english: The dream had distressed her greatly.
sentences.chinese: 这场梦使她深感不安。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel very upset

sentences.english: a man distributing leaflets to passers-by
sentences.chinese: 一个向路人派发传单的男子

sentences.english: Make sure that your weight is evenly distributed.
sentences.chinese: 注意让你的重量分布均匀。

detailed_translations.english: to share things among a group of people, especially in a planned way

sentences.english: Sorry to disturb you, but I have an urgent message.
sentences.chinese: 对不起打扰一下，我有个紧急消息。

sentences.english: The thieves fled when they were disturbed by a neighbour.
sentences.chinese: 窃贼们被一名邻居惊动后逃跑了。

sentences.english: (= a sign you put on a door so that people will not interrupt you ) .
sentences.chinese: 请勿打扰。

detailed_translations.chinese: 打扰；妨碍；使不安；弄乱；使恼怒
detailed_translations.english: to interrupt someone so that they cannot continue what they are doing

sentences.english: David’s parents divorced when he was six.
sentences.chinese: 戴维的父母在他六岁时离婚了。

sentences.english: My father threatened to divorce her.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲威胁说要和她离婚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离婚； 分离， 脱离
detailed_translations.english: if someone divorces their husband or wife, or if two people divorce, they legally end their marriage
the legal ending of a marriage

sentences.english: She was treated by her local doctor.
sentences.chinese: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
sentences.chinese: 我想预约看皮尤医生。

sentences.english: a Doctor of Law
sentences.chinese: 法学博士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill

sentences.english: traditional doctrines of divine power
sentences.chinese: 神力的传统教义

sentences.english: Marxist doctrine
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义学说

detailed_translations.english: a set of beliefs that form an important part of a religion or system of ideas

sentences.english: It cost three dollars.
sentences.chinese: 它要三美元。

sentences.english: a ten-dollar bill
sentences.chinese: 一张十元钞票

sentences.english: You can pay in dollars or euros at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 在机场你可以使用美元或欧元。

detailed_translations.english: the standard unit of money in the US, Canada, Australia, and some other countries, divided into 100  cent s  : symbol $

name: domestic
trans: adj.家庭的;本国的,国内的;驯养的

sentences.english: ...over 100 domestic flights a day to 30 leading U.S. destinations.
sentences.chinese: …每天飞往美国30个主要目的地的100多个国内航班。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or happening in one particular country and not involving any other countries

sentences.english: people who volunteer to donate blood
sentences.chinese: 自愿献血者

detailed_translations.english: to give something, especially money, to a person or an organization in order to help them

sentences.english: Could you open the door for me?
sentences.chinese: 请你帮我开门好吗？

sentences.english: The door flew open and Ruth stormed in.
sentences.chinese: 门一下子打开了，露丝气冲冲地跑了进来。

sentences.english: Don’t forget to lock the garage door.
sentences.chinese: 别忘了把车库的门锁上。

sentences.english: Marc appeared through a door at the far end of the room.
sentences.chinese: 马克从房间另一端的门口出现。

sentences.english: the family that lives three doors up from us
sentences.chinese: 住在与我们相隔三户的那户人家

detailed_translations.english: a piece of wood, glass, etc. that is opened and closed so that people can get in and out of a room, building, car, etc.; a similar thing in a cupboard/closet

name: doubt
trans: n.疑惑，疑问 v.怀疑，不相信

sentences.english: There was still one little nagging doubt at the back of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的心头仍有一丝挥之不去的疑虑。

sentences.english: Kim never doubted his story.
sentences.chinese: 例句：金对于他讲的事情从不怀疑。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being not sure whether something is true or right
to think that something may not be true or that it is unlikely

sentences.english: Prospects for a lasting peace remain doubtful.
sentences.chinese: 持久和平的前景难料。

sentences.english: ‘Everything’s going to be all right, you’ll see.’ Jenny looked doubtful .
sentences.chinese: “一切都会顺顺当当的，你等着看好了。” 珍妮看起来不大相信的样子。

detailed_translations.english: probably not true or not likely to happen

name: down
trans: adv.向下，在下面；处于低落状态 prep.沿着...而下

sentences.english: David bent down to tie his shoelace.
sentences.chinese: 戴维弯腰系鞋带。

sentences.english: Get down off the table.
sentences.chinese: 从桌子上下来。

sentences.english: Tears were streaming down my face.
sentences.chinese: 我泪流满面。

sentences.english: The sun was going down and it would soon be dark.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下，天很快就要黑了。

sentences.english: They came running down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他们跑下楼来。

sentences.english: She stood on a balcony looking down into the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 她站在阳台上朝下面的院子望去。

sentences.english: Glancing down the list of runners, I noticed a familiar name.
sentences.chinese: 我往下扫了一眼赛跑选手的名单，注意到了一个熟悉的名字。

sentences.english: Her hair came down to her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发一直垂到腰际。

sentences.english: Ken fell asleep face down (= with his face towards the ground ) on the couch.
sentences.chinese: 肯趴在长沙发上睡着了。

sentences.english: We heard the sound of laughter down below.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到下面有笑声。

sentences.english: The bathroom is down those stairs.
sentences.chinese: 浴室在那段楼梯下面。

detailed_translations.english: to or towards a lower place or position

name: downstairs
trans: adv.在楼下；往楼下 adj. 楼下的 n. 楼下

sentences.english: Rosie ran downstairs to answer the door.
sentences.chinese: 罗茜跑下楼去开门。

sentences.english: Charles was downstairs in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯在楼下厨房里。

sentences.english: She repainted the downstairs rooms and closed off the second floor.
sentences.chinese: 她重新粉刷了楼下的房间，并把二楼封上了。

detailed_translations.english: towards or on a lower floor of a building, especially a house
Downstairs means situated on the ground floor of a building or on a lower floor than you are
the rooms on the ground floor in a house

name: downtown
trans: adj.往市中心的 adv.向市中心区 n.城镇中心区

sentences.english: By day he worked downtown for American Standard.
sentences.chinese: 白天，他在市中心为美国标准公司工作。

sentences.english: ...an office in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: …芝加哥市中心的一间办公室。

sentences.english: ...in a large vacant area of the downtown.
sentences.chinese: …在市中心的一大块空地上。

detailed_translations.english: Downtown is also an adverb
Downtown places are in or toward the centre of a large town or city, where the stores and places of business are
Downtown is also a noun

sentences.english: the great traditions of ancient Greek drama
sentences.chinese: 古希腊戏剧的伟大传统

sentences.english: a new drama series for Saturday nights
sentences.chinese: 周六晚上播放的新连续剧

sentences.english: a drama critic
sentences.chinese: 戏剧评论员

sentences.english: a courtroom drama
sentences.chinese: 法庭剧

sentences.english: a lavish costume drama
sentences.chinese: 豪华古装剧

sentences.english: He plays a Russian spy in the comedy drama ‘Sleepers’.
sentences.chinese: 他在喜剧片《潜伏特工》中扮演一名俄罗斯间谍。

detailed_translations.chinese: 戏剧， 剧本； 戏剧性事件
detailed_translations.english: a play for the theatre, television, radio etc, usually a serious one, or plays in general

sentences.english: A superb goal by Owen earned United a dramatic victory yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天欧文的一个超级入球为联队赢得了激动人心的胜利。

sentences.english: Some of the most dramatic events in American history happened here.
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上一些最震撼人心的事件发生在这里。

sentences.english: the dramatic scenery of the Grand Canyon
sentences.chinese: 大峡谷的壮丽景致

detailed_translations.chinese: 引人注目的， 激动人心的； 戏剧的
detailed_translations.english: exciting or impressive

sentences.english: Katie had drawn a cottage with a little stream running next to it.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂画了一间小茅舍，旁边流淌着一条小溪。

sentences.english: She asked the little girl to draw a picture of the man she’d spoken to.
sentences.chinese: 她让小女孩把刚才和她说话的那个男人画出来。

sentences.english: Keith was drawing a complicated-looking graph.
sentences.chinese: 基思在画一张看上去很复杂的图表。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to draw very well.
sentences.chinese: 我从来就画不好图画。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a picture of something using a pencil, pen etc

sentences.english: The prospect of flying filled me with dread .
sentences.chinese: 想到要乘飞机我充满了恐惧。

sentences.english: She lives in dread of (= is continuously very afraid of ) the disease returning.
sentences.chinese: 她整天担心着会旧病复发。

detailed_translations.english: a strong fear of something that is going to happen or may happen
to feel anxious or worried about something that is going to happen or may happen

sentences.english: a dreadful accident
sentences.chinese: 可怕的事故

sentences.english: They suffered dreadful injuries.
sentences.chinese: 他们严重受伤。

detailed_translations.english: causing fear or suffering

name: dream
trans: n.梦想，愿望 v.向往；做梦

sentences.english: I had lots of dreams last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我做了很多梦。

sentences.english: Her dream is to make a movie.
sentences.chinese: 她的梦想是要拍一部电影。

sentences.english: It’s quite common to dream that you’re falling.
sentences.chinese: 梦到自己坠落是常有的事。

detailed_translations.english: a series of thoughts, images, and feelings that you experience when you are asleep
to have a dream while you are asleep

sentences.english: a gentleman in evening dress
sentences.chinese: 穿晚礼服的绅士

sentences.english: The play was performed in modern dress (= clothes from the present time ) .
sentences.chinese: 这出戏里演员是现代装束。

detailed_translations.english: clothes for men or women of a particular type or for a particular occasion

sentences.english: You should drink plenty of water.
sentences.chinese: 你应该大量喝水。

sentences.english: What would you like to drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝点什么？

sentences.english: Take a seat while I get you something to drink .
sentences.chinese: 请坐，我去给你倒杯喝的。

sentences.english: She filled the glass and drank.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子倒满后喝了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
an amount of liquid that you drink, or the act of drinking something

sentences.english: Can you drive?
sentences.chinese: 你会开车吗？

sentences.english: We watched Dad drive the posts into the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着爸爸把木桩打入地里。

sentences.english: With a few loud whistles, they drove the donkeys out of the enclosure.
sentences.chinese: 随着几声响亮的哨声，他们把驴子赶出了围栏。

detailed_translations.english: to make a car, truck, bus etc move along

sentences.english: a taxi driver
sentences.chinese: 出租车司机

sentences.english: Do you think you’re a good driver?
sentences.chinese: 你认为自己是个好司机吗？

detailed_translations.english: someone who drives a car, bus etc

name: drop
trans: v.(使)滴下；(使)落下；(使)下降 n.滴

sentences.english: Your button has dropped off.
sentences.chinese: 你的纽扣掉了。

sentences.english: The number of deaths on the roads has dropped sharply.
sentences.chinese: 交通事故死亡人数已大大减少。

detailed_translations.english: to fall suddenly onto the ground or into something

name: due
trans: adj.到期的；应付的 n.应得的东西

sentences.english: The team are due to fly to Italy next month.
sentences.chinese: 该球队预定下个月飞往意大利。

sentences.english: Any money due you will be sent by cheque through the post.
sentences.chinese: 应该支付给你的款项将会以支票邮寄给你。

detailed_translations.english: expected to happen or arrive at a particular time

sentences.english: During the summer she worked as a lifeguard.
sentences.chinese: 夏天她当过救生员。

sentences.english: He slept calmly during the early part of the night.
sentences.chinese: 他上半夜睡得很安稳。

sentences.english: Foxes remain hidden during the day.
sentences.chinese: 狐狸白天一直躲藏着。

detailed_translations.english: from the beginning to the end of a period of time

sentences.english: I promise I will do my duty .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会尽到我的责任。

sentences.english: We feel it is our duty to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我们感到帮助她是我们的责任。

sentences.english: Local authorities have a duty to keep the streets clean.
sentences.chinese: 地方当局有责任保持街道整洁。

sentences.english: You have a duty to your husband and to your children.
sentences.chinese: 你对你丈夫和孩子负有责任。

sentences.english: She has a strong sense of moral duty .
sentences.chinese: 她的道德责任感很强。

sentences.english: Martin’s duties included cleaning the cars.
sentences.chinese: 马丁的职责包括清洗汽车。

sentences.english: the duty on cigarettes
sentences.chinese: 香烟税

detailed_translations.english: something that you have to do because it is morally or legally right

sentences.english: They reviewed each aspect of the plan bit by bit.
sentences.chinese: 他们对计划的各个方面逐一地进行了审核。

sentences.english: He’s a bright kid and eager to learn.
sentences.chinese: 他是个聪明的孩子，热爱学习。

sentences.english: She’s a very hard worker and very eager to please.
sentences.chinese: 她工作很卖力，而且很希望别人满意。

sentences.english: A crowd of eager young students were already waiting outside.
sentences.chinese: 一群急不可待的青年学生已经在外面等着。

detailed_translations.english: very keen and excited about something that is going to happen or about something you want to do

sentences.english: We arrived early.
sentences.chinese: 我们提早到了。

sentences.english: They must have come home early.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定提早回到家了。

sentences.english: the early morning sunshine
sentences.chinese: 清晨的阳光

detailed_translations.english: before the usual, arranged, or expected time
in the first part of a period of time, event, or process

sentences.english: He earns nearly £20,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 他每年挣近20,000英镑。

sentences.english: You don’t earn much money being a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 当护士挣钱并不多。

sentences.english: He did all sorts of jobs to earn a living.
sentences.chinese: 他为谋生什么活都干。

sentences.english: I was the only person in the house who was earning.
sentences.chinese: 我是家里唯一上班挣钱的人。

sentences.english: She was earning good money at the bank.
sentences.chinese: 她在银行工作，收入不错。

sentences.english: You could earn a higher rate of interest elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 你在别处可以获得更高的利率。

detailed_translations.english: to receive a particular amount of money for the work that you do

sentences.english: the planet Earth
sentences.chinese: 地球

sentences.english: The earth shook.
sentences.chinese: 大地晃动了。

detailed_translations.english: the planet that we live on

sentences.english: An earthquake measuring 6.1 on the Richter scale struck southern California on June 28.
sentences.chinese: 6月28日加州南部地区发生了里氏6.1级地震。

sentences.english: The city is in an earthquake zone.
sentences.chinese: 该市位于地震带。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden shaking of the earth’s surface that often causes a lot of damage

sentences.english: The test was easy.
sentences.chinese: 考试很容易。

sentences.english: Finishing the task will not be easy.
sentences.chinese: 完成这项任务并不容易。

sentences.english: There must be an easier way to do that.
sentences.chinese: 一定有更容易的方法去做那件事。

sentences.english: instructions that are easy to follow
sentences.chinese: 易于掌握的使用说明

sentences.english: It would have been easy for the team to lose the game.
sentences.chinese: 球队本来是很容易会输掉这场比赛的。

sentences.english: Having you here does make things a lot easier for me.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，有你在这里事情的确好办多了。

sentences.english: On the whole, Dad has had an easy life.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，爸爸过着安逸舒适的生活。

sentences.english: You can have an easy time of it now that the kids have all left home.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们都离开了家，你日子可以过得轻松了。

detailed_translations.english: not difficult to do, and not needing much effort

sentences.english: They won quite easily.
sentences.chinese: 他们赢得相当轻松。

sentences.english: We found the house easily enough.
sentences.chinese: 我们轻轻松松就找到了房子。

detailed_translations.english: without problems or difficulties

name: ease
trans: v.减轻；使舒适 n.容易；舒适

sentences.english: She lived a life of ease.
sentences.chinese: 她过着悠闲自在的生活。

sentences.english: The plan should ease traffic congestion in the town.
sentences.chinese: 这项计划对城里的交通拥挤状况应该有所缓解。

detailed_translations.english: lack of difficulty
to become or to make sth less unpleasant, painful, severe, etc.

sentences.english: Felix chatted cheerfully as he ate.
sentences.chinese: 费利克斯一边吃一边兴奋地聊天。

sentences.english: A small girl was eating an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩在吃冰激凌。

sentences.english: We had plenty to eat and drink.
sentences.chinese: 我们有很多吃的喝的。

sentences.english: It’s important to eat healthily when you are pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 怀孕的时候吃得健康很重要。

sentences.english: I exercise and eat right and get plenty of sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我做运动，饮食得当，睡眠充足。

sentences.english: Would you like something to eat?
sentences.chinese: 想吃点什么吗？

sentences.english: She can eat like a horse and never put on weight.
sentences.chinese: 她可以吃得很多，但体重从来不会增加。

sentences.english: We stopped at McDonalds to get a bite to eat.
sentences.chinese: 我们在麦当劳停下来吃点东西。

sentences.english: Good eating habits are the best way of preventing infection.
sentences.chinese: 良好的饮食习惯是预防感染的最佳方法。

sentences.english: ‘More cake?’ ‘No thanks, I couldn’t eat another thing.’
sentences.chinese: “再来点蛋糕？” “不要了，谢谢。 我再也吃不下了。”

sentences.english: No chicken for me. I don’t eat meat (= I never eat meat ).
sentences.chinese: 我不要鸡肉，我不吃肉的。

sentences.english: Does Rob eat fish?
sentences.chinese: 罗布吃鱼吗？

detailed_translations.english: to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it
to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it

name: echo
trans: v.出回声；反响，共鸣 n.回声；反响，共鸣

sentences.english: Her scream was followed by a loud echo.
sentences.chinese: 她的尖叫声过后是响亮的回声。

sentences.english: ‘He's gone! ’ Viv echoed.
sentences.chinese: “他去了！”维夫重复道。

detailed_translations.english: a sound that you hear again after a loud noise, because it was made near something such as a wall
to repeat what someone else has just said

sentences.english: a successful economy
sentences.chinese: 发展成功的经济

sentences.english: In the current economic climate (= conditions ), we must keep costs down.

detailed_translations.english: relating to trade, in-dustry, and the management of money

sentences.chinese: 该课本初版于1858年，现在已经是第39版了。

sentences.english: She also hopes her children will get a good education.
sentences.chinese: 她也希望她的孩子可以受到良好的教育。

detailed_translations.english: the process of teaching and learning, usually at school, college, or university

name: effect
trans: v.产生  n.结果，效果；影响，作用

sentences.english: the long-term effects of the drug
sentences.chinese: 这种毒品的长期影响

sentences.chinese: 大量减少该止痛药的服用剂量依然能产生预期的效果。

detailed_translations.english: a change that is caused by an event, action etc

sentences.english: The cheaper drugs are just as effective in treating arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 较便宜的药品对治疗关节炎同样有效。

sentences.english: the painting’s highly effective use of colour

sentences.chinese: 训练的效果往往远低于预期。

sentences.english: the most effective ways of reducing inner city congestion

detailed_translations.english: successful, and working in the way that was intended

sentences.english: Lou lifted the box easily, without using much effort.
sentences.chinese: 卢没费多大力气就把箱子搬了起来。

sentences.english: Frank put a lot of effort into the party.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克办这次聚会花了不少精力。

sentences.english: Learning to speak another language takes effort.

name: elder
trans: adj.年龄较大的,年长的 n.(pl.)长者，长辈

sentences.chinese: 两人当中萨拉年纪较长。

sentences.english: a meeting of the village elders
sentences.chinese: 村里长辈们的集会

detailed_translations.english: the elder of two people, especially brothers and sisters, is the one who was born first
a member of a tribe or other social group who is important and respected because they are old

sentences.chinese: 工党在2001年选举中以巨大优势获胜。

sentences.chinese: 州长选举将于11月25日举行。

sentences.english: an electric blanket
sentences.chinese: 电热毯

detailed_translations.english: needing electricity to work, produced by electricity, or used for carrying electricity

sentences.chinese: 那个农场非常偏远，但有电力供应。

detailed_translations.english: the power that is carried by wires, cables etc, and is used to provide light or heat, to make machines work etc

sentences.english: We’ll have to take the elevator.
sentences.chinese: 我们只好坐电梯了。

detailed_translations.english: a machine that takes people and goods from one level to another in a building

sentences.chinese: 我还有其他事情要谈一谈。

sentences.english: I’d like you to come, and anyone else who’s free.
sentences.chinese: 我想请你过来，其他人有空也可以来。

sentences.chinese: “请来两杯咖啡。”“还要别的吗？”“不要了，谢谢。

sentences.chinese: 她追求爱情胜过一切。

sentences.chinese: 在那些漫长的旅途中我们别无他事可做。

detailed_translations.english: besides or in addition to someone or something
You use else after words such as "anywhere," "someone," and "what" to refer in a vague way to another person, place, or thing

sentences.english: Lifeguards are trained to deal with emergencies.
sentences.chinese: 救生员接受过应对紧急情况的训练。

sentences.chinese: 那架飞机不得不紧急着陆。

sentences.english: He emigrated to Belgium.
sentences.chinese: 他移民去了比利时。

detailed_translations.english: to leave your own country in order to live in another country

sentences.chinese: 她的声音充满了激情。

sentences.english: She was good at hiding her emotions.
sentences.chinese: 她很会掩饰自己的情感。

sentences.chinese: 报告强调了改进安全标准的重要性。

sentences.chinese: 政府政策重心的变化

detailed_translations.english: special attention or importance

sentences.english: The factory employs over 2,000 people.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂雇用了2,000多名员工。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is paid to work for someone else

detailed_translations.english: the condition of having a paid job

sentences.chinese: 空盒子

sentences.english: an empty bottle
sentences.chinese: 空瓶子

sentences.english: an empty space behind the desk

sentences.chinese: 燃油箱快要空了。

name: enable
trans: v.使能够，使成为可能，使实现

sentences.chinese: 新的检验使医生能在早期发现该种疾病。

sentences.chinese: 那位医生过去曾碰到过好几个类似病例。

trans: n.末尾，尽头，终点；完结，终止

sentences.chinese: 他的眼镜架在鼻尖上。

sentences.chinese: 那些孩子哪来这么多精力？

sentences.english: I really put a lot of energy into what I do.
sentences.chinese: 我做起事来总是投入很大精力。

sentences.chinese: 精力旺盛的男子

sentences.chinese: 争取更多客户的十足干劲

sentences.chinese: 停车限制将会严格执行。

sentences.chinese: 唱片公司未必能强迫一位已出名的艺人接受他们的意见。

sentences.chinese: 她踩下离合器，汽车便开动了。

sentences.chinese: 这座桥是现代工程的一大成就。

sentences.chinese: 他接受过土木工程师培训。

name: English
trans: adj.英国的；英国人的 n.英语

sentences.chinese: 你会说英语吗？

sentences.chinese: 用简单英语写的传单

relating to England or its people
a division of the United Kingdom

sentences.chinese: 我们在纽约的时间过得十分快活。

sentences.english: Thanks for a great evening. I really enjoyed it.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你这美好的晚会。我真的玩得很开心。

trans: adj./adv.足够的/地，充分的/地 n.充足,足够

sentences.english: Is there enough room for me?
sentences.chinese: 有足够的地方给我吗？

sentences.chinese: 我们离开得不够早。

detailed_translations.english: used before plural or uncountable nouns to mean ‘as many or as much as sb needs or wants ’

sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

name: enterprise
trans: n.事业；企(事) 业单位；事业心

sentences.chinese: 国有企业/公共事业单位

sentences.english: We’re looking for young people with enterprise and creativity.
sentences.chinese: 我们在寻找有事业心和创造力的年轻人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 事业,企(事)业单位；事业心,进取心
detailed_translations.english: a company, organization, or business

sentences.chinese: 该镇提供各式各样的娱乐活动。

sentences.chinese: 现场表演将持续一整天。

sentences.chinese: 海豚具有很高的娱乐价值。

detailed_translations.english: things such as films, television, performances etc that are intended to amuse or interest people

sentences.chinese: 吉利恩和达伦非常热情地接待了演讲者。

sentences.english: We went along to the local diving club, full of enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 我们兴高采烈地去了当地的潜水俱乐部。

sentences.chinese: 他们执行任务时没多大干劲。

sentences.chinese: 耽误了两小时没有减弱他们的热情。

sentences.english: an enthusiastic supporter of reform
sentences.chinese: 改革的热心支持者

detailed_translations.english: feeling or showing a lot of interest and excitement about something

sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最糟糕的一天。

sentences.english: The entire staff agreed.
sentences.chinese: 全体员工都同意了。

sentences.chinese: 你把整瓶酒都喝了吗？

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to emphasize that you mean all of a group, period of time, amount etc

sentences.english: Some of these chemicals are very damaging to the environment.
sentences.chinese: 这些化学品中有些对环境非常有害。

sentences.english: legislation to protect the environment
sentences.chinese: 保护环境的法规

sentences.english: the effects of acid rain on the environment
sentences.chinese: 酸雨对环境的影响

sentences.english: the government minister for the environment
sentences.chinese: 负责环境事务的政府部长

detailed_translations.english: the air, water, and land on Earth, which is affected by man’s activities

sentences.english: I really envy you and Ian, you seem so happy together.
sentences.chinese: 我真是羡慕你和伊恩，你俩在一起看起来多幸福。

sentences.english: She has a lifestyle which most people would envy.
sentences.chinese: 她的生活方式会令大多数人感到羡慕。

sentences.english: She could see that all the other girls were green with envy(= feeling a lot of envy ).
sentences.chinese: 她看得出其他女孩都很眼红。

detailed_translations.english: to wish that you had someone else’s possessions, abilities etc
the feeling of wanting something that someone else has

sentences.english: I never liked long walks, especially in winter.
sentences.chinese: 我向来不喜欢长距离散步，尤其在冬天。

sentences.english: Art books are expensive to produce, especially if they contain colour illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 美术类书籍制作成本很高，尤其是那些带彩色插图的。

sentences.english: I was especially fond of chocolate biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 我特别爱吃巧克力饼干。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is more important or happens more with one particular thing than with others

name: essay
trans: n.论文, 短评, 散文, 文章，随笔

sentences.english: an essay on Bernard Shaw
sentences.chinese: 关于萧伯纳的文章

sentences.english: We asked Jason to write an essay about his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 我们让杰森写一篇关于他家乡的短文。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of writing about a particular subject by a student as part of a course of study

name: essential
trans: adj.(to) 必要的，本质的；n.要素

sentences.english: Window locks are fairly cheap and absolutely essential.
sentences.chinese: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

sentences.english: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
sentences.chinese: 即使在小公司里，计算机也是不可或缺的工具。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary
something that is necessary to do something or in a particular situation

sentences.english: a country estate
sentences.chinese: 乡村的庄园

detailed_translations.chinese: 土地， 住宅区， 地产； 财产， 遗产； 庄园， 种植园
detailed_translations.english: a large area of land in the country, usually with one large house on it and one owner

name: estimate
trans: v.估计，估量 n.估计,估价,估计数

sentences.chinese: 估计一下需要多少步才能到达一个近距目标。

detailed_translations.english: to try to judge the value, size, speed, cost etc of something, without calculating it exactly

detailed_translations.chinese: 估计； 评价； 看法
detailed_translations.english: a calculation of the value, size, amount etc of something made using the information that you have, which may not be complete

sentences.chinese: 东欧

detailed_translations.english: the continent that is north of the Mediterranean and goes as far east as the Ural Mountains in Russia

sentences.english: European languages
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的语言

sentences.english: our European partners
sentences.chinese: 我们的欧洲伙伴

detailed_translations.english: relating to Europe or its people
someone from Europe

sentences.chinese: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.chinese: 这很难看得见，即使开着灯也没有用。

sentences.chinese: 他相当成功，甚至还上了一次电视节目。

sentences.chinese: 她甚至连电话都没打给我们。
