sentences.english: His proposal was rejected outright (= completely rejected ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的建议被彻底否决了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拒绝； 拒纳， 退回， 摈弃
detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept, believe in, or agree with something

detailed_translations.chinese: 被拒货品， 不合格产品
detailed_translations.english: a product that has been rejected because there is something wrong with it

sentences.english: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.english: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.chinese: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

detailed_translations.english: if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected

sentences.english: diplomatic/international/foreign relations
sentences.chinese: 外交 / 国际 / 对外关系

sentences.english: a close/near/distant relation of mine
sentences.chinese: 我的一位近亲 / 远亲

detailed_translations.english: the way in which two people, groups or countries behave towards each other or deal with each other

sentences.english: Gentle exercise can relax stiff shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 和缓的运动可以使僵硬的肩部肌肉放松。

detailed_translations.english: if you relax a part of your body or it relaxes, it becomes less stiff or less tight
to rest or do something that is enjoyable, especially after you have been working

sentences.english: Police arrested several men, who were later released.
sentences.chinese: 警察逮捕了几个人，后来都释放了。

sentences.english: The bears are eventually released into the wild.
sentences.chinese: 这些熊最后被放回野生环境中。

sentences.english: You need to release the tension in these shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 你需要放松肩部肌肉。

sentences.english: The new trade figures have just been released.
sentences.chinese: 新的贸易数字刚刚公布。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere

sentences.english: Relevant documents were presented in court.
sentences.chinese: 法庭上出示了相关的文件。

sentences.english: We received all the relevant information.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了所有相关信息。

detailed_translations.english: directly relating to the subject or problem being discussed or considered

sentences.english: Marijuana can provide pain relief for some cancer patients.
sentences.chinese: 大麻可以为一些癌症患者减轻疼痛。

sentences.english: money raised for the relief effort
sentences.chinese: 为赈灾筹集的钱款

detailed_translations.english: when something reduces someone’s pain or unhappy feelings

sentences.english: Drugs helped to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 药物有助于舒缓疼痛。

sentences.english: A secretary was hired to relieve her of some of the administrative work.
sentences.chinese: 一个秘书被雇来为她减轻一些行政工作的负担。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce someone’s pain or unpleasant feelings

sentences.english: I knew I could rely on David.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我可以信赖戴维。

sentences.english: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers.
sentences.chinese: 他们非常依赖专业顾问的建议。

detailed_translations.english: to depend on something in order to continue to live or exist

sentences.english: The refugees were allowed to remain in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 难民获准留在英国。

sentences.english: They were cleaning up the remains of their picnic.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在打扫野餐的残余物。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in the same place without moving away

detailed_translations.chinese: 残余； 残骸； 遗迹
detailed_translations.english: Theremainsof something are the parts of it that are left after most of it has been taken away or destroyed

sentences.english: She has made remarkable progress.
sentences.chinese: 她取得了显著的进步。

sentences.english: a remarkable coincidence
sentences.chinese: 不寻常的巧合

sentences.english: He’s a remarkable man .
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人。

detailed_translations.english: unusual or surprising and therefore deserving attention or praise

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

sentences.english: Yes, I’ll be there. Thanks for reminding me.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我会去那里的。 谢谢提醒。

sentences.english: He made a few notes to remind himself of what he wanted to say.
sentences.chinese: 他记了几条，提醒自己要说些什么。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone remember something that they must do

sentences.english: a cleaner that will remove wine stains
sentences.chinese: 可去除葡萄酒酒渍的清洁剂

sentences.english: The college removed rules that prevented women from enrolling.
sentences.chinese: 这所大学取消了禁止女性入学的规定。

detailed_translations.english: to get rid of something so that it does not exist any longer

sentences.english: an obligation to render assistance to those in need
sentences.chinese: 为有困难的人提供援助的义务

sentences.english: a bill of $3,200 for services rendered
sentences.chinese: 一张3,200美元服务费的账单

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone or do something, because it is your duty or because someone expects you to

sentences.english: I pay the rent at the beginning of every month.
sentences.chinese: 我每逢月初交付房租。

sentences.english: She rents out two rooms to students.
sentences.chinese: 她把两个房间出租给学生

detailed_translations.english: the money that someone pays regularly to use a room, house etc that belongs to someone else
to let someone live in a house, room etc that you own, or use your land, in return for money

sentences.english: Dad was up the ladder, repairing the roof.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸在梯子上修补屋顶。

sentences.english: Where can I get my shoes repaired ?
sentences.chinese: 哪儿能修补鞋子？

sentences.english: The church tower is in need of repair.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的塔楼需要修缮。

detailed_translations.english: to fix something that is damaged, broken, split, or not working properly
something that you do to fix a thing that is damaged, broken, or not working

sentences.english: Can you repeat your question?
sentences.chinese: 你能重复一遍你的问题吗？

sentences.english: Sorry - could you repeat that?
sentences.chinese: 对不起——你能再说一遍吗？

sentences.english: It is not, I repeat not, my fault.
sentences.chinese: 那不是我的错，我再说一遍，不是。

sentences.english: It was a terrible journey - I hope we don’t have a repeat performance (= have the same thing happen again ) on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 这一路上太糟糕了——我希望回程可不要再发生同样的事。

detailed_translations.english: to say or write something again
an event that is very like something that happened before

sentences.english: I’m replacing Sue on the team.
sentences.chinese: 我将接替队里的休。

sentences.english: Lectures have replaced the old tutorial system.
sentences.chinese: 课堂授课取代了旧式的导师制。

detailed_translations.english: to start doing something instead of another person, or start being used instead of another thing

sentences.english: I asked Clive where he was going, but he didn’t reply.
sentences.chinese: 我问克莱夫到哪儿去，但他没有回答。

sentences.english: Sorry it took me so long to reply.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，我过了这么久才回复。

sentences.english: ‘Did you see Simon today?’ ‘Of course,’ Nathalie replied with a smile.
sentences.chinese: “你今天见到西蒙了吗？”“当然啦。”纳萨莉笑着答道。

sentences.english: I tried calling, but there was no reply.
sentences.chinese: 我试着打电话去，但没有人接。

detailed_translations.english: to answer someone by saying or writing something
something that is said, written, or done as a way of replying

sentences.english: This is Gavin Williams, reporting from the United Nations in New York.
sentences.chinese: 我是加文·威廉斯，在纽约联合国总部为您报道。

sentences.english: We aim to report the news as fairly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们力求公正地报道这一新闻。

sentences.english: The incident was widely reported in the national press.
sentences.chinese: 这一事件在全国的媒体上被广泛报道。

detailed_translations.english: to give people information about recent events, especially in newspapers and on television and radio

sentences.english: a news reporter
sentences.chinese: 新闻记者

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to write about news events for a newspaper, or to tell people about them on television or on the radio

sentences.english: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.chinese: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为…的代表， 表示， 象征； 描绘， 表现
detailed_translations.english: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people

sentences.english: the former Federal Republic of Germany
sentences.chinese: 前德意志联邦共和国

sentences.english: Nine republics took part in the referendum.
sentences.chinese: 有九个共和国参加了全民公决。

detailed_translations.english: a country governed by elected representatives of the people, and led by a president, not a king or queen

sentences.english: Alice Munro has a reputation for being a very depressing writer.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯•门罗有文风抑郁的名声。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion that people have about someone or something because of what has happened in the past

sentences.english: Campbell’s broken leg will probably require surgery.
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔的一条腿骨折，可能需要手术。

sentences.english: What’s required is a complete reorganization of the system.
sentences.chinese: 需要做的是彻底整顿整个系统。

sentences.english: Most house plants require regular watering.
sentences.chinese: 大多数室内盆栽植物需要定期浇水。

sentences.english: The bill failed to get the required number of votes.
sentences.chinese: 法案没有得到规定的票数。

detailed_translations.english: to need something

sentences.english: They have made an urgent request for international aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们紧急请求国际援助。

sentences.chinese: 欲知详情，请拨打我们的免费电话。

sentences.chinese: 买房子之前作些了解，这想法很对。

sentences.chinese: 古尔德在研究过程中得到了当地博物学家的帮助。

sentences.chinese: 他一直在研究材料，准备做一个纪录片。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of finding information about something that you are interested in or need to know about

sentences.english: Do you have to reserve tickets in advance?
sentences.chinese: 你必须预先订票吗？

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc to be kept for you to use at a particular time in the future

detailed_translations.chinese: 储备； 保留； 拘谨， 矜持； 替补队员， 后备部队； 自然保护区
detailed_translations.english: a supply of something kept to be used if it is needed

sentences.english: to resist change
sentences.chinese: 抵制变革

sentences.english: He tried to pin me down, but I resisted.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制伏我，但我奋力反抗。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept sth and try to stop it from happening

sentences.english: Barnet was desperate for money to resolve his financial problems.
sentences.chinese: 巴尼特急需钱来解决他的经济问题。

sentences.english: After the divorce she resolved never to marry again.
sentences.chinese: 离婚以后，她决心永不再嫁。

sentences.english: Recent events strengthened her resolve to find out the truth.
sentences.chinese: 最近发生的事件坚定了她找出真相的决心。

detailed_translations.english: to find a satisfactory way of dealing with a problem or difficulty

sentences.english: The boys showed a complete lack of respect for authority.
sentences.chinese: 这些男孩子根本无视权威。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of admiring someone or what they do, especially because of their personal qualities, knowledge, or skills
to admire someone because they have high standards and good qualities such as fairness and honesty

sentences.english: They are likely to respond positively to the president's request for aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们有可能积极地回应该总统的援助请求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回答， 答复； 作出反应， 响应
detailed_translations.english: to do something as a reaction to something that has been said or done

sentences.english: Kelly’s promotion means more money and more responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 凯利获得提升，这意味着钱多了，责任也更大了。

detailed_translations.english: a duty to be in charge of someone or something, so that you make decisions and can be blamed if something bad happens

sentences.english: We are determined to bring the people responsible to justice.
sentences.chinese: 我们决意要将肇事者绳之以法。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is responsible for an accident, mistake, crime etc, it is their fault or they can be blamed

sentences.english: If you’re tired, we’ll stop and rest for a while.
sentences.chinese: 如果你累了，我们就停下来歇一会儿。

detailed_translations.english: to stop working or doing an activity for a time and sit down or lie down to relax

detailed_translations.chinese: 休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架
detailed_translations.english: a period of time when you are not doing anything tiring and you can relax or sleep

sentences.chinese: 他带她到一家豪华餐厅吃了一顿有五道菜的晚餐。

sentences.english: The company runs a chain of restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 公司经营连锁饭店。

sentences.english: A new restaurant has just opened across the road.
sentences.chinese: 马路对面刚开了一家新饭馆。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can buy and eat a meal

sentences.english: The new law restricts the sale of hand guns.
sentences.chinese: 新法规限制手枪的销售。

sentences.english: You may need to restrict access to certain files (= limit the number of people who can read them ) .
sentences.chinese: 某些档案可能需要限制查阅。

sentences.chinese: 这个协议将限制竞争。

sentences.chinese: 拥挤的居住条件严重限制了孩子们玩耍的自由。

detailed_translations.english: to limit or control the size, amount, or range of something

sentences.chinese: 你会如何应付失业及由此造成的收入损失？

detailed_translations.english: if something results from something else, it is caused by it
something that happens or exists because of something that happened before

sentences.english: You have the right to retain possession of the goods.
sentences.chinese: 你有权保留这些物品。

sentences.english: The state wants to retain control of food imports.
sentences.chinese: 政府想保留对食品进口的控制权。

detailed_translations.english: to keep something or continue to have something

sentences.chinese: 在大多数人退休的年纪，他准备要面对一项新事业。

sentences.english: I retired late that evening.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我睡得晚。

detailed_translations.english: to stop working, usually because you have reached a certain age

sentences.english: He may be prosecuted for revealing secrets about the security agency.
sentences.chinese: 他可能因泄露安全部门的机密而被起诉。

sentences.english: a test that can reveal a teacher’s hidden skills
sentences.chinese: 能够展现老师潜在技能的测试

detailed_translations.english: to make known something that was previously secret or unknown

sentences.english: advertising revenue
sentences.chinese: 广告收入

sentences.english: Strikes have cost £20 million in lost revenues .
sentences.chinese: 罢工造成的收入损失达到2,000万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: money that a business or organization receives over a period of time, especially from selling goods or services

sentences.english: The government will review the situation later in the year.
sentences.chinese: 政府将在今年晚些时候对形势重新加以研究。

sentences.english: The decision will be reviewed by the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 这个判决将由最高法院复核。

sentences.english: The team manager’s position will be reviewed at the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 球队主教练的人选将在赛季末重新考虑。

sentences.english: If you have to cover 12 chapters in American history, begin by planning on three two-hour reviews with four chapters per session.
sentences.chinese: 如果你必须涵盖美国史的12个章节，首先计划3次2小时的复习，每次4章。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully examine or consider sth again, especially so that you can decide if it is necessary to make changes
(North Amercian English) a lesson in which you look again at sth you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam

name: reward
trans: n.(for)报酬，赏金 v.(for)酬劳，奖赏

sentences.english: The school has a system of rewards and punishments to encourage good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 学校有奖惩制度以鼓励良好行为。

sentences.english: The club’s directors rewarded him with a free season ticket.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的董事们奖给他一张免费季票。

detailed_translations.english: something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard
to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked fo

sentences.english: Rich mineral deposits have been found in the sea bed.
sentences.chinese: 海底发现有丰富的矿床。

sentences.english: Red meat is a rich source of iron.
sentences.chinese: 红肉含有大量铁质。

sentences.english: This is a system in which the rich are taken care of and the poor are left to suffer.
sentences.chinese: 这是个富人受关照，而穷人遭罪的制度。

detailed_translations.english: containing a lot of something

detailed_translations.chinese: (Rich)人名；(丹)里克；(捷)里赫；(英、西)里奇；(葡、法)里什
detailed_translations.english: The rich are rich people

sentences.english: We made our way carefully along the ridge.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着山脊小心前行。

detailed_translations.english: a long area of high land, especially at the top of a mountain

name: right
trans: n. 右 边 adj.右边的 adv.正好

sentences.english: Yes, that’s the right answer .
sentences.chinese: 对，回答正确。

sentences.english: Is that the right time ?
sentences.chinese: 那个时间对吗？

sentences.english: I got most of the questions right .
sentences.chinese: 大部分问题我都答对了。

sentences.english: His ideas have now been proved right .
sentences.chinese: 他的观点现已证明是对的。

detailed_translations.english: a statement or piece of information that is right is correct and based on true facts

exactly in a particular position or place

name: rise
trans: v.起立,上升,增长 n.起源,发生,上升

sentences.english: The police seem unable to cope with the rising tide of (= large increase in ) car crime.
sentences.chinese: 面对日益增多的汽车罪案，警方似乎无能为力。

detailed_translations.english: to increase in number, amount, or value

sentences.chinese: 滑雪者始终面临着受重伤的风险。

sentences.english: It was a risk, sending a letter to my house.
sentences.chinese: 将信寄到我家是冒险。

sentences.english: the Mississippi River
sentences.chinese: 密西西比河

sentences.english: the River Thames
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河

detailed_translations.english: a natural and continuous flow of water in a long line across a country into the sea

sentences.english: 65 Maple Road
sentences.chinese: 枫树路65号

detailed_translations.english: a specially prepared hard surface for cars, buses, bicycles etc to travel on

sentences.english: cars built by robots
sentences.chinese: 机器人制造的汽车

detailed_translations.english: a machine that can move and do some of the work of a person, and is usually controlled by a computer

sentences.chinese: 她刚在他们最新的作品中取得了主角。

sentences.chinese: 球滚到了街上。

sentences.chinese: 摄影机开始转动，大家安静了下来。

sentences.chinese: 当古罗马人征服不列颠时，他们把这一习俗也带了过去。

detailed_translations.english: a citizen of ancient Rome or its empire

sentences.chinese: “我过生日时汤姆总是给我送红玫瑰。”“多浪漫啊！”

sentences.chinese: 我四下看了看房间。

sentences.chinese: 这是你的钥匙——348号房间。

detailed_translations.english: to rent and live in a room somewhere

sentences.chinese: 树根

sentences.english: These plants produce a number of thin roots.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物会长出一些细根。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a plant or tree that grows under the ground and gets water from the soil
to grow roots

sentences.chinese: 她的双手因为干重活而变得很粗糙。

sentences.english: the rough terrain at the base of the mountains
sentences.chinese: 山脚下崎岖不平的地形

sentences.chinese: 我们在崎岖的地面上颠簸而行。

sentences.chinese: 粗略的翻译

trans: n.例行公事，常规 adj.常规的，例行的

sentences.chinese: 约翰的离去打乱了他们的日常生活。

sentences.chinese: 我每天的锻炼习惯

sentences.chinese: 穿衣打扮是我们每天必做的事情。

sentences.chinese: 你不必担心，这只是例行的询问。

sentences.chinese: 火车正在运送过去由卡车运送的大批货物。

detailed_translations.english: to send something somewhere using a particular route

sentences.chinese: 王宫

sentences.english: the royal family
sentences.chinese: 王室

detailed_translations.english: relating to or belonging to a king or queen

sentences.english: a rubbish bin
sentences.chinese: 垃圾桶

detailed_translations.english: food, paper etc that is no longer needed and has been thrown away

sentences.english: a rude remark
sentences.chinese: 粗鲁的话

sentences.english: I didn’t mean to be rude, but I had to leave early.
sentences.chinese: 我并不想显得无礼，但我不得不早走。

detailed_translations.english: speaking or behaving in a way that is not polite and is likely to offend or annoy people

sentences.english: A Persian rug covered the hardwood floors.
sentences.chinese: 一张波斯小地毯铺在了那硬木地板上。

sentences.chinese: 这位老妇人坐在靠窗的椅子上，膝上盖着一块小毛毯。

sentences.english: an interesting old ruin
sentences.chinese: 一处有意思的古老废墟

sentences.english: the ruins of a bombed-out office block
sentences.chinese: 被炸毁的办公楼的废墟

sentences.chinese: 杰弗逊因为那场官司倾家荡产。

sentences.english: This illness has ruined my life.
sentences.chinese: 这个病毁掉了我的生活。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a building that is left after the rest has been destroyed
to make someone lose all their money

sentences.english: The judge ruled that she should have custody of the children.
sentences.chinese: 法官判定孩子的监护权归她。

detailed_translations.english: to make an official decision about something, especially a legal problem

sentences.chinese: 有一段时间她在波士顿开餐馆。

sentences.english: Many people don’t care who runs the country.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不在乎由谁统治国家。

sentences.english: Courses are currently being run in London and Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 目前伦敦和爱丁堡两地都开设了这些课程。

sentences.english: Many people belong to a pension scheme run by their employers.
sentences.chinese: 许多人参加了由雇主管理的养老金计划。

sentences.english: a state-run (= controlled by the government ) television station
sentences.chinese: 国营电视台

detailed_translations.english: to organize or be in charge of an activity, business, organization, or country

detailed_translations.chinese: 奔跑；赛跑；趋向；奔跑的路程
detailed_translations.english: to be very busy and continuously rushing about

sentences.english: a rural setting
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境

sentences.english: rural bus routes
sentences.chinese: 乡村公共汽车路线

detailed_translations.english: happening in or relating to the countryside, not the city

sentences.english: A small girl rushed past her.
sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩从她身边匆匆经过。

sentences.english: Mo rushed off down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 莫匆匆走过走廊。

detailed_translations.english: to move very quickly, especially because you need to be somewhere very soon
to do or decide something too quickly, especially so that you do not have time to do it carefully or well

sentences.english: The relationship had been important to me and its loss left me feeling sad and empty.
sentences.chinese: 这种关系对我一直都很重要，失去它让我感到难过而空虚。

sentences.english: I'm sad that Julie's marriage is on the verge of splitting up.
sentences.chinese: 我为朱莉的婚姻处于破裂的边缘感到难过。

detailed_translations.english: If you are sad, you feel unhappy, usually because something has happened that you do not like

sentences.english: She doesn’t feel safe in the house on her own.
sentences.chinese: 她独自一人在家感到不安全。

sentences.english: Make sure you keep these documents safe .
sentences.chinese: 你一定要妥善保管这些文件。

detailed_translations.english: not in danger of being harmed, lost, or stolen

sentences.english: International safeguards prevent the increase of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 国际安全条约防止核武器数量增加。

detailed_translations.chinese: [安全] 保护；保卫；保护措施
detailed_translations.english: a rule, agreement etc that is intended to protect someone or something from possible dangers or problems
to protect something from harm or damage

sentences.english: You shouldn’t travel alone, for safety’s sake .
sentences.chinese: 为安全起见，不要独自一人旅行。

sentences.english: For your own safety , please do not smoke inside the plane.
sentences.chinese: 为了您自身的安全，请不要在飞机上吸烟。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安全；保险；安全设备；保险装置；安打
detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is safe from danger or harm

sentences.english: a yacht with white sails
sentences.chinese: 扬着白帆的游艇

sentences.english: The trawler had sailed from the port of Zeebrugge.
sentences.chinese: 那只拖网渔船已经从泽布吕赫港启航。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of strong cloth fixed onto a boat, so that the wind will push the boat along
to travel on or across an area of water in a boat or ship

sentences.english: The average salary for a teacher is $39,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 教师的平均工资是39,000美元一年。

detailed_translations.english: money that you receive as payment from the organization you work for, usually paid to you every month

sentences.chinese: 哈维每做成一笔生意可得到50美元的佣金。

sentences.english: Car salesmen will often bring down the price rather than lose a sale (= fail to sell something ) .
sentences.chinese: 汽车推销员常常宁愿降价也不愿失去一笔生意。

sentences.english: arms sales to Iran
sentences.chinese: 对伊朗的军火销售

detailed_translations.chinese: 销售；出售；拍卖；销售额；廉价出售
detailed_translations.english: when you sell something

sentences.english: Her perfume has always had the same effect on me.
sentences.chinese: 她身上的香水给我的感觉一如既往。

sentences.english: He’s the same old Peter – moody and irritable.
sentences.chinese: 他还是以前那个彼得——喜怒无常且爱发火。

detailed_translations.chinese: 相同的；同一的；上述的（通常与the连用）；无变化的
detailed_translations.english: used to say that a particular person or thing does not change

detailed_translations.chinese: 同样的事物或人（通常与the连用）
detailed_translations.english: used to say that two or more people or things are exactly like each other
in the same way

sentences.english: They took a blood sample to test for hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 他们取了血样做肝炎化验。

detailed_translations.english: a small part or amount of something that is examined in order to find out something about the whole

detailed_translations.chinese: 从…抽样； 品尝， 体验
detailed_translations.english: to taste food or drink in order to see what it is like

sentences.english: the launch of a communications and weather satellite
sentences.chinese: 气象通信卫星的发射

detailed_translations.english: a machine that has been sent into space and goes around the Earth, moon etc, used for radio, television, and other electronic communication

sentences.english: Nothing I did would ever satisfy my father.
sentences.chinese: 我做什么都不能让父亲满意。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel pleased by doing what they want

sentences.english: She got great satisfaction from helping people to learn.
sentences.chinese: 她在帮助人们学习的过程中得到很大的满足。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of happiness or pleasure because you have achieved something or got what you wanted

sentences.english: The festivities begin Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 庆祝活动从星期六开始。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Friday and Sunday

sentences.english: We’ll save a lot of time if we go by car.
sentences.chinese: 我们要是开车去，可以节省很多时间。

sentences.english: Everyone is being encouraged to save energy.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都被鼓励节约能源。

sentences.english: ways to save money on heating bills
sentences.chinese: 节省取暖费的种种办法

detailed_translations.english: to use less money, time, energy etc so that you do not waste any

sentences.english: ‘I’m so tired,’ she said.
sentences.chinese: “我太累了。”她说。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t cry,’ he said softly.
sentences.chinese: “别哭了。”他柔声说道。

sentences.english: Don’t believe anything he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说什么都不要相信。

sentences.english: I always said I would buy a motorbike when I had enough money.
sentences.chinese: 我一直说等我有了足够的钱就买一辆摩托车。

sentences.english: I would like to say how much we appreciate your hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我想说我们对你的辛勤劳动非常感谢。

sentences.english: ‘Why did she leave?’ ‘I don’t know – she didn’t say .’
sentences.chinese: “她为什么要离开？”“我不知道——她没说。”

sentences.english: Although he didn’t say so , it was clear that he was in pain.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他没说，但是他明显很痛苦。

sentences.english: (= why do you think that ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会那么说呢？

sentences.english: I’d like to say a few words (= make a short speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 我想简单地说几句。

sentences.english: ‘So what are your plans now?’‘ I’d rather not say .’
sentences.chinese: “那么你现在的计划是什么？”“我还是不说的好。”

detailed_translations.english: to express an idea, feeling, thought etc using words

sentences.english: A structural survey revealed the full scale of the damage.
sentences.chinese: 结构检验揭示了实际受损程度。

sentences.english: I was shocked by the sheer scale (= very big scale ) of the destruction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏程度之大让我大为震惊。

sentences.english: Large firms benefit from economies of scale (= ways of saving money because they are big ) .
sentences.chinese: 大公司从规模经济中得益。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大小，规模；等级，级别；天平，磅秤；比例；刻度，标度；鳞
detailed_translations.english: the size or level of something, or the amount that something is happening
to climb to the top of something that is high and difficult to climb

sentences.english: You really gave us a scare !
sentences.chinese: 你真的吓了我们一跳！

detailed_translations.english: a sudden feeling of fear

sentences.english: How can he fit everything into his busy schedule ?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么把所有的事情都排进自己忙碌的时间表的？

sentences.english: I’m going to be working to a very tight schedule (= including a lot of things that must be done in a short time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的工作安排将会非常紧。

detailed_translations.english: a plan of what someone is going to do and when they are going to do it

sentences.english: The money will be used for teacher training schemes.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将用于教师培训计划。

sentences.english: a pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 退休金计划

sentences.english: a get-rich-quick scheme
sentences.chinese: 快速致富的手段

detailed_translations.english: an official plan that is intended to help people in some way, for example by providing education or training

sentences.english: She won a scholarship to Iowa State University.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了艾奥瓦州立大学的奖学金。

sentences.english: Her latest publication is a fine piece of scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 她最新出版的作品是一部优秀的学术著作。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is given to someone by an educational organization to help pay for their education

sentences.english: a Shakespearean scholar
sentences.chinese: 研究莎士比亚的学者

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, especially one that is not a science subject

sentences.english: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.english: the founder of modern science, Isaac Newton
sentences.chinese: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.english: developments in science and technology
sentences.chinese: 科学技术的发展

detailed_translations.english: knowledge about the world, especially based on examining, testing, and proving facts

sentences.english: We believe in investing in scientific research.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信科学研究的投资价值。

sentences.english: the limits of scientific knowledge
sentences.chinese: 科学知识的极限

sentences.english: decisions based on scientific evidence
sentences.chinese: 根据科学证据作出的决定

sentences.english: the international scientific community (= scientists )
sentences.chinese: 国际科学界

detailed_translations.english: about or related to science, or using its methods

sentences.english: He is a scientist of high prestige.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位有声望的科学家。

sentences.english: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.english: The scientist thirsts after an achievement.
sentences.chinese: 这名科学家渴望取得成就。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works or is trained in science

sentences.english: Do not scold the puppy, but simply and firmly say ‘no’.
sentences.chinese: 不要责骂小狗，但要干脆利落地说“不”。

detailed_translations.english: to angrily criticize someone, especially a child, about something they have done

sentences.english: measures to limit the scope of criminals’ activities
sentences.chinese: 限制罪犯活动范围的措施

detailed_translations.english: the range of things that a subject, activity, book etc deals with

sentences.english: After the first few shots, people started screaming.
sentences.chinese: 几声枪响过后，人们开始尖叫起来。

sentences.english: a screaming baby
sentences.chinese: 尖声哭叫的婴儿

sentences.english: The children were screaming with laughter .
sentences.chinese: 小孩子们在尖声欢笑。

sentences.english: She was screaming her head off (= screaming a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 她不停地尖叫。

sentences.english: She began to scream blue murder (= scream very loudly ) .
sentences.chinese: 她开始高声尖叫。

sentences.english: He was dragged kicking and screaming to a nearby van.
sentences.chinese: 他又踢又叫着被拖到附近的一辆小货车上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尖叫；呼啸；发出尖锐刺耳的声音；令人触目惊心
detailed_translations.english: to make a loud high noise with your voice because you are hurt, frightened, excited etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 尖叫声；尖锐刺耳的声音；极其滑稽可笑的人
detailed_translations.english: a loud high sound that you make with your voice because you are hurt, frightened, excited etc

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

sentences.english: Jay stripped his clothes off and ran into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 杰伊脱光衣服奔入海里。

sentences.english: Most exports went by sea .
sentences.chinese: 大部分出口商品都走海路。

sentences.english: a little cottage by the sea
sentences.chinese: 一座海滨小屋

sentences.english: He spent over 30 years at sea .
sentences.chinese: 他在船上工作了30多年。

sentences.english: They stood side by side looking out to sea .
sentences.chinese: 他们并排站着眺望大海。

detailed_translations.english: the large area of salty water that covers much of the Earth’s surface

sentences.english: It was too dark to search further.
sentences.chinese: 天太暗，无法继续寻找。

sentences.english: The area was thoroughly searched .
sentences.chinese: 这一地区已被彻底搜查过。

sentences.english: I’ve searched high and low (= everywhere ) for my glasses.
sentences.chinese: 我到处找我的眼镜。

detailed_translations.english: to try to find someone or something by looking very carefully
an attempt to find someone or something

sentences.english: the effect on plants as the seasons start to change
sentences.chinese: 换季对植物的影响

detailed_translations.english: one of the main periods into which a year is divided, each of which has a particular type of weather. The seasons are spring, summer, autumn, and winter
to add salt, pepper etc to food you are cooking

sentences.english: I was in the back seat and Jo was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.english: a 10,000-seat stadium
sentences.chinese: 万人体育场

sentences.english: People were shifting in their seats, looking uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

sentences.english: He waved toward a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他朝一把椅子一挥手，在桌旁坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can sit, especially one in a vehicle or one from which you watch a performance, sports event etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
detailed_translations.english: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

sentences.english: Any proposal must be seconded by two other members of the committee.
sentences.chinese: 任何提案须有委员会其他两位委员附议。

detailed_translations.english: to formally support a suggestion made by another person in a meeting

sentences.english: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

sentences.english: the secretary of the tennis club
sentences.chinese: 网球俱乐部的干事

sentences.english: the Foreign Secretary
sentences.chinese: 外交大臣

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in an office typing letters, keeping records, answering telephone calls, arranging meetings etc

name: secret
trans: adj.秘密的，机密的 n.秘密

sentences.english: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你，这是个秘密。

sentences.english: It was no secret that the two men hated each other.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男人相互仇视，这算不得什么秘密。

sentences.english: Don’t worry. Your secret is safe with me (= I won’t tell anyone about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我会替你保守秘密。

sentences.english: Your hair always looks so great – what’s your secret ?
sentences.chinese: 你的头发看起来总是很漂亮——你的秘诀是什么？

sentences.english: They kept their relationship secret from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩的关系瞒着父母。

detailed_translations.english: something that is kept hidden or that is known about by only a few people
known about by only a few people and kept hidden from others

sentences.english: The plane’s tail section was found in a cornfield.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的尾部在玉米田里找到了。

sentences.english: the smoking section (= where you can smoke )
sentences.chinese: 吸烟区

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts that something such as an object or place is divided into

sentences.english: There are no secure jobs these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今已经没有铁饭碗了。

sentences.english: We want a secure future for our children.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望我们的孩子未来生活无虞。

sentences.english: United’s position at the top of the league seems relatively secure.
sentences.chinese: 联队在联赛中的头名位置似乎相对稳固。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that is secure is one that you can depend on because it is not likely to change
to make something safe from being attacked, harmed, or lost

sentences.english: The trial was held under tight security .
sentences.chinese: 这场审讯是在戒备森严的情况下进行的。

sentences.english: lax security at airline check-in desks
sentences.chinese: 登机手续柜台松懈的安全措施

sentences.english: terrorist activity that is a threat to national security
sentences.chinese: 威胁国家安全的恐怖活动

sentences.english: The prison was ordered to tighten security after a prisoner escaped yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天一名囚犯越狱后，该监狱被勒令加强安全措施。

sentences.english: The Security Commission investigates breaches of security .
sentences.chinese: 安全委员会对违反安全规定的事项进行调查。

sentences.english: We have been asked not to say anything for security reasons .
sentences.chinese: 出于安全考虑，我们被要求守口如瓶。

sentences.english: The security forces opened fire, killing two people.
sentences.chinese: 保安部队开枪打死了两个人。

sentences.english: The thief was caught on a security camera .
sentences.chinese: 小偷被保安摄像机当场拍了下来。

sentences.english: There are strict security checks on everyone entering the Opera House.
sentences.chinese: 每个人进入歌剧院都要接受严格的安全检查。

sentences.english: A large number of homes lack adequate security measures .
sentences.chinese: 许多住宅都未采取足够的安全措施。

detailed_translations.english: things that are done to keep a person, building, or country safe from danger or crime

sentences.english: The moment we saw the house, we knew we wanted to buy it.
sentences.chinese: 我们一看到这房子就知道我们要买。

sentences.english: He crouched down so he couldn’t be seen.
sentences.chinese: 他蹲下来好让别人看不见他。

sentences.english: Can I see your ticket, please?
sentences.chinese: 我能看看你的票吗？

sentences.english: I saw the offer advertised in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 我在报纸上看到这个减价的广告。

sentences.english: Have you seen Chris (= do you know where he is ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你见过克里斯吗？

sentences.english: The accommodation was so awful it had to be seen to be believed (= you would not believe it if you did not see it yourself ) .
sentences.chinese: 住宿条件太糟了，不是亲眼所见是不会相信的。

detailed_translations.english: to notice or examine someone or something, using your eyes

sentences.english: new graduates seeking employment
sentences.chinese: 正在求职的刚毕业的大学生

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to seek alternative routes.
sentences.chinese: 驾车者被告知需另寻其他路线。

sentences.english: They quickly sought to distance themselves from the protesters.
sentences.chinese: 他们迅速设法远离抗议者。

detailed_translations.english: to look for someone or something

sentences.english: Ann didn’t seem very sure.
sentences.chinese: 安看来并不十分肯定。

sentences.english: It seems a foolish decision now.
sentences.chinese: 现在看来这是一个愚蠢的决定。

sentences.english: It seems like you’re catching a cold, Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 你好像感冒了，泰勒。

sentences.english: ‘So Bill’s leaving her?’ ‘ So it seems (= that seems to be true ) .’
sentences.chinese: “这么说来，比尔要离开她？”“好像是这样。”

detailed_translations.english: if something seems to be true, there are qualities or facts that make people think it is true

sentences.english: The party was small and select.
sentences.chinese: 团里人员不多，都是经过精心挑选的。

sentences.english: Honorary degrees are handed out to a select few .
sentences.chinese: 荣誉学位颁给挑选出的少数几个人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精选的， 挑选出来的； 优等的， 第一流的
detailed_translations.english: a select group of people or things is a small special group that has been chosen carefully
to choose something or someone by thinking carefully about which is the best, most suitable etc

sentences.english: The judges have made their final selection.
sentences.chinese: 评委已经作出最后的评选。

sentences.english: These drawings represent a selection from a larger exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 这些画作是从一个规模更大的展会上选出来的。

detailed_translations.english: the careful choice of a particular person or thing from a group of similar people or things

sentences.english: How can you be so selfish?
sentences.chinese: 你怎能这样自私？

sentences.english: selfish behaviour
sentences.chinese: 自私的行为

detailed_translations.english: caring only about yourself and not about other people – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: If you offer him another hundred, I think he’ll sell.
sentences.chinese: 如果你再加一百元钱，我想他会卖的。

sentences.english: He regrets selling all his old records.
sentences.chinese: 他后悔把所有的老唱片都卖掉了。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone in exchange for money

sentences.english: Lyn sent some pictures of the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 琳恩寄了几张婚礼照片。

detailed_translations.chinese: [sent-sent] 送， 寄； 派遣， 打发； 发送； 发射
detailed_translations.english: to arrange for something to go or be taken to another place, especially by post

name: senior
trans: n.年长者；上级 adj.年长的；资格老的

sentences.english: Seniors can get a 10% discount.
sentences.chinese: 老年人可以享受10%的折扣。

detailed_translations.english: a  senior citizen

name: sense
trans: v.感觉，意识到 n.感觉,感官,意识

sentences.english: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.chinese: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.english: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.english: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.english: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.chinese: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.english: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.chinese: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感官；感觉；理解力；判断力；意义
detailed_translations.english: one of the five natural powers of sight, hearing, feeling, taste, and smell, that give us information about the things around us
if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof

sentences.english: She seems very sensible.
sentences.chinese: 她好像很明智。

sentences.english: sensible advice
sentences.chinese: 合理的建议

sentences.english: It’s sensible to keep a note of your passport number.
sentences.chinese: 把你的护照号码记下来是明智的。

sentences.english: Moving house seemed like the sensible thing to do .
sentences.chinese: 搬家似乎是明智的做法。

detailed_translations.english: reasonable, practical, and showing good judgment

sentences.english: She received an eight-year prison sentence.
sentences.chinese: 她被判八年徒刑。

sentences.english: He has just begun a life sentence for murder.
sentences.chinese: 他犯了谋杀罪，刚开始服无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Sanchez was sentenced to three years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 桑切斯被判了三年监禁。

detailed_translations.english: a punishment that a judge gives to someone who is guilty of a crime
if a judge sentences someone who is guilty of a crime, they give them a punishment

sentences.english: The product suddenly took off in September.
sentences.chinese: 该产品在九月份突然热销起来。

sentences.english: Do I remember that September afternoon when I first met you?
sentences.chinese: 还记不记得第一次遇见你的那个九月的下午？

sentences.english: The carmaker is almost ready to launch out a new model in September.
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造商将于九月投产新型汽车。

detailed_translations.english: the ninth month of the year, between August and October

sentences.english: the serious problem of unemployment
sentences.chinese: 严重的失业问题

sentences.english: Luckily, the damage was not serious.
sentences.chinese: 还好，损坏不算严重。

sentences.english: Serious crimes have increased dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 重大犯罪案件大幅度增加了。

sentences.english: Oil spills pose a serious threat to marine life.
sentences.chinese: 原油泄漏对海洋生物构成了严重威胁。

sentences.english: The president was in serious trouble .
sentences.chinese: 总统遇到大麻烦了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的
detailed_translations.english: a serious situation, problem, accident etc is extremely bad or dangerous

sentences.english: the health service
sentences.chinese: 医疗保健服务

sentences.english: the postal service
sentences.chinese: 邮政服务

sentences.english: the police service
sentences.chinese: 警察部门

sentences.english: the prison service
sentences.chinese: 监狱系统

sentences.english: Workers in the emergency services (= the police, hospital, and the fire service ) are forbidden from striking.
sentences.chinese: 紧急服务机构的工作人员是禁止罢工的。

sentences.english: There has been a decline in public services in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来公共服务减少了。

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["the police, hospitals, fire service, and organizations that provide basic things such as water, gas, or electricity"],"COLLOINEXA":["the essential services"]}
sentences.chinese: 基础服务部门

detailed_translations.english: the official system for providing something, especially something that everyone in a country needs to have, or the official organization that provides it

detailed_translations.chinese: 服务性的；耐用的；服现役的

detailed_translations.english: if someone services a machine or vehicle, they examine it and do what is needed to keep it working well

sentences.english: There was only one girl serving customers .
sentences.chinese: 只有一个女孩在接待顾客。

detailed_translations.chinese: 招待，供应；为…服务；对…有用；可作…用
detailed_translations.english: to help the customers in a shop, especially by bringing them the things that they want
the action in a game such as tennis or  volleyball  when you throw the ball in the air and hit it over the net

sentences.english: Many young girls became domestic servants .
sentences.chinese: 许多年轻姑娘成了家仆。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially in the past, who was paid to clean someone’s house, cook for them, answer the door etc, and who often lived in the house

sentences.english: Board members met in closed session (= with nobody else present ) .
sentences.chinese: 委员会成员举行了闭门会议。

detailed_translations.english: a formal meeting or group of meetings, especially of a law court or parliament

sentences.english: The set (x, y) has two members.
sentences.chinese: （x, y）这个集里有两个项。

detailed_translations.english: a group of numbers, shapes etc in mathematics

sentences.english: When the children had settled, Miss Brown gave out the new reading books.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们静下来后，布朗小姐给他们发新的故事书。

sentences.english: She breathed deeply to settle her nerves (= stop herself from feeling worried or frightened ) .
sentences.chinese: 她深深地吸了口气平静自己的情绪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安排， 安放； 调停； 支付， 核算； 安家； 飞落， 停留； 安定
detailed_translations.english: to become quiet and calm, or to make someone quiet and calm

sentences.english: I have several suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个建议。

sentences.english: I have several methods.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个方法。

sentences.english: I have several reasons to support my view.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个理由来支持我的观点。

sentences.english: His injuries were quite severe.
sentences.chinese: 他的伤势很严重。

sentences.english: She’s suffering from severe depression.
sentences.chinese: 她患有严重的抑郁症。

sentences.english: The US faces severe economic problems.
sentences.chinese: 美国面临严重的经济问题。

sentences.english: The storm caused severe damage.
sentences.chinese: 这场暴风雨造成了严重的破坏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严重的； 严厉的， 严格的； 严峻的， 艰难的； 朴素的， 不加装饰的
detailed_translations.english: severe problems, injuries, illnesses etc are very bad or very serious

sentences.english: All you see on TV is sex and violence these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今在电视上看到的尽是性和暴力。

sentences.english: They had sex in the back seat of his car.
sentences.chinese: 他们在他的汽车后座上做了爱。

sentences.english: She no longer wanted to have sex with him.
sentences.chinese: 她再也不想和他做爱了。

sentences.english: the dangers of casual sex
sentences.chinese: 性关系随便的危险性

detailed_translations.english: the physical activity that two people do together in order to produce babies, or for pleasure

detailed_translations.chinese: 引起…的性欲；区别…的性别
detailed_translations.english: to find out whether an animal is male or female

name: shade
trans: n.阴影；遮光物 v.遮蔽，遮光

sentences.english: a delicate/pale/rich/soft shade of red
sentences.chinese: 淡 / 浅 / 艳 / 柔和的红色

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of red, green, blue etc

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
detailed_translations.english: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

sentences.english: As a kid he’d never share his toys.
sentences.chinese: 他小时候从不肯与人分享他的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone have or use something that belongs to you
one of the equal parts into which the  ownership  of a company is divided

sentences.english: Make sure you use a good sharp knife.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要用锋利的好刀。

sentences.english: Its teeth are razor sharp (= very sharp ) .
sentences.chinese: 它的牙齿非常锋利。

sentences.english: Do not cross the bridge but turn sharp left to go down on to the towpath.
sentences.chinese: 不要过桥，而是向左急转下到纤道上去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 急剧的；锋利的；强烈的；敏捷的；刺耳的
detailed_translations.english: having a very thin edge or point that can cut things easily
Sharp is also an adverb

sentences.english: They need to shift from farming to industry, and they need to do so desperately.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要从农业领域转移到工业领域。 他们需要拼命地那么做。

sentences.english: the shift from one type of economic system to another
sentences.chinese: 从一种经济体系向另一种经济体系的转变

detailed_translations.english: to change a situation, discussion etc by giving special attention to one idea or subject instead of to a previous one
a change in the way people think about something, in the way something is done etc

sentences.english: We'll ship your order to the address we print on your cheques.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你预订的货物送到我们印在你单据上的地址。

detailed_translations.english: to send goods somewhere by ship, plane, truck etc
a large boat used for carrying people or goods across the sea

sentences.english: I have to wear a shirt and tie to work.
sentences.chinese: 我上班要穿衬衫打领带。

sentences.english: a check shirt
sentences.chinese: 格子衬衫

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the upper part of your body and your arms, usually has a collar, and is fastened at the front by buttons

sentences.english: The hatred in her voice shocked him.
sentences.chinese: 她语气中的仇恨让他震惊。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel very surprised and upset, and unable to believe what has happened

name: shoot
trans: v.摄影；开枪；(开枪或射箭)打死

sentences.english: Police shot one suspect when he pulled a gun on them.
sentences.chinese: 警方在一名嫌疑人拔枪指着他们时击毙了他。

sentences.english: Smith killed his wife, and then shot himself.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯杀死妻子，然后开枪自杀。

sentences.english: A woman was shot dead in an attempted robbery.
sentences.chinese: 一名女子在一桩未遂抢劫案中中枪身亡。

sentences.english: The guards have orders to shoot intruders on sight (= shoot them as soon as they see them ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫兵们奉命一见到有人闯入就开枪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately kill or injure someone using a gun
an occasion when someone takes photographs or makes a film

sentences.english: a barber’s shop
sentences.chinese: 理发店

sentences.english: a fish-and-chip shop
sentences.chinese: 炸鱼薯条店

sentences.english: the local shops
sentences.chinese: 当地的商店

sentences.english: Shirley saw her reflection in the shop window.
sentences.chinese: 雪莉在商店橱窗里看到了自己的影像。

sentences.english: I’m just going down to the shops .
sentences.chinese: 我正要去商店。

detailed_translations.english: a building or part of a building where you can buy things, food, or services
to go to one or more shops to buy things

sentences.english: a short meeting
sentences.chinese: 一个短会

sentences.english: Morris gave a short laugh.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯笑了一声。

sentences.english: a short course on business English
sentences.chinese: 商业英语短期课程

sentences.english: Winter is coming and the days are getting shorter.
sentences.chinese: 冬天来临，白天变短了。

sentences.english: I’ve only been in Brisbane a short time .
sentences.chinese: 我才来布里斯班不久。

sentences.english: For a short while (= a short time ) , the city functioned as the region’s capital.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市曾经在很短的一段时间里是这个地区的首府。

sentences.english: I learned a lot during my short period as a junior reporter.
sentences.chinese: 在当初级记者的这段短暂时间里，我学到了许多。

sentences.english: Germany achieved spectacular economic success in a relatively short period of time .
sentences.chinese: 德国在相对较短的时间里取得了非凡的经济成就。

sentences.english: They met and married within a short space of time .
sentences.chinese: 他们从相识到结婚时间很短。

sentences.english: I promise to keep the meeting short and sweet (= short in a way that is good, especially not talking for a long time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会议开得简短不拖拉。

sentences.english: For a few short weeks (= they seemed to pass very quickly ) the sun shone and the fields turned gold.
sentences.chinese: 短短的几个星期里，阳光照耀，田野变成了一片金黄。

detailed_translations.english: happening or continuing for only a little time or for less time than usual
a short film shown in the cinema
to almost do something but then decide not to do it

sentences.english: There is no heating available due to fuel shortages.
sentences.chinese: 因为燃料短缺，所以没有供暖。

sentences.english: There is no shortage of funds.
sentences.chinese: 不缺资金。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there is not enough of something that people need

sentences.english: He shouldn’t be so selfish.
sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.english: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.chinese: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do

sentences.english: The residents are being asked to shoulder the costs of the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 居民们被要求承担这笔修理费用。

sentences.english: They shouldered the boat and took it down to the river.
sentences.chinese: 他们把船扛在肩上抬到河里。

detailed_translations.english: to accept a difficult or unpleasant responsibility, duty etc

name: show
trans: v.出示；显示  n.展览会；演出

sentences.english: Think positively and show some determination.
sentences.chinese: 要往好的方面想，拿出决心来。

sentences.english: She had learned not to show her emotions .
sentences.chinese: 她早就学会了不流露出自己的感情。

sentences.english: It was the sound a man might make when in pain but trying not to show it.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个人强忍着疼痛不愿表露出来时发出的声音。

sentences.english: Mary showed great interest in the children.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽对这些小孩子表示出极大的兴趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 显现， 显露， 露面； 演出， 放映
detailed_translations.english: to let your feelings, attitudes, or personal qualities be clearly seen

detailed_translations.chinese: 表演，节目；演出，上映；展览，展览物，展览会；显示，展示；表面，外观
detailed_translations.english: a performance for the public, especially one that includes singing, dancing, or jokes

detailed_translations.chinese: 给看，显示，出示；引领，带领；教，告知，说明；表明，证明
detailed_translations.english: to let someone see something

sentences.english: I’m worried about washing that shirt in case it shrinks.
sentences.chinese: 我不太敢洗那件衬衫，怕它会缩水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 起皱； 收缩； 退缩， 畏缩
detailed_translations.english: to become smaller, or to make something smaller, through the effects of heat or water

sentences.english: Shut the window, Ellen!
sentences.chinese: 埃伦，把窗关上！

sentences.english: I heard his bedroom door shut.
sentences.chinese: 我听到他的卧室门关上了。

sentences.english: She lay down on her bed and shut her eyes .
sentences.chinese: 她在床上躺下，闭上眼睛。

sentences.english: He shut the drawer and turned the key.
sentences.chinese: 他关上抽屉，转动了钥匙。

detailed_translations.english: to close something, or to become closed
not open

sentences.english: His mother’s very sick.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲病得很重。

sentences.english: Maria can’t come in today because she’s sick.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚因为生病今天不能来了。

sentences.english: a sick child
sentences.chinese: 生病的孩子

sentences.english: a sick animal
sentences.chinese: 患病的动物

sentences.english: What will happen to the business if you fall sick (= become ill ) or die?
sentences.chinese: 假如你生病或是去世了，公司怎么办？

sentences.english: He took sick (= became ill ) and died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒后一周就去世了。

sentences.english: Pete’s at home in bed, sick as a dog (= very sick ) .
sentences.chinese: 皮特卧床在家，病得很重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 厌恶的；病态的；不舒服；渴望的；恶心的 ；生病的
detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or illness
people who are ill

sentences.english: Fuel is cheaper on the French side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 燃料在边境那边的法国要便宜些。

sentences.english: A man stood watching me from the other side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 有个男人站在马路的对面看着我。

sentences.english: His friends and family were all on the other side of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友和家人都在地球的另一边。

sentences.english: The restaurant was empty apart from another couple on the far side of the room (= the area that is furthest away from you ) .
sentences.chinese: 饭店里空空的，只有最那边还有一对夫妇。

sentences.english: He is in charge of the civilian side of the UN mission.
sentences.chinese: 他在联合国使团中负责平民方面的事务。

sentences.english: Frank sided with David against their mother.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克站在戴维一边反对妈妈。

sentences.english: Hannah slipped out through a side exit.
sentences.chinese: 汉娜从一个侧门溜了出去。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two areas that are on the left or the right of an imaginary line, or on the left or the right of a border, wall, river etc
to support or argue against a person or group in a quarrel, fight etc
in or on the side of something

sentences.english: Anne’s sight is very good for someone of her age.
sentences.chinese: 安妮的视力对于她这个年龄的人来说算是非常好的。

sentences.english: He began to lose his sight six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前他开始视力衰退。

sentences.english: an emergency operation to save his sight
sentences.chinese: 挽救他视力的紧急手术

sentences.english: You will get a free sight test if you are under 16.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不满16岁，可以免费检查视力。

detailed_translations.english: the physical ability to see
to see something from a long distance away, or see something you have been looking for

sentences.english: the dollar sign
sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or shape that has a particular meaning
to write your signature on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

name: signal
trans: n.信号，暗号 v.用信号通知 adj.信号的

sentences.english: He pressed the red alarm signal to see if it was on or off.
sentences.chinese: 他按了一下红色报警信号钮，检查一下它是开著的还是关著的。

detailed_translations.english: important
a sound or action that you make in order to give information to someone or tell them to do something
to make a sound or action in order to give information or tell someone to do something

sentences.english: His most significant political achievement was the abolition of the death penalty.
sentences.chinese: 他政治上最重大的成就是废除了死刑。

sentences.english: Please inform us if there are any significant changes in your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你们的计划如有重大变动，请通知我们。

detailed_translations.english: having an important effect or influence, especially on what will happen in the future

sentences.english: a decision of major political significance
sentences.chinese: 具有重大政治意义的决定

detailed_translations.english: the importance of sth, especially when this has an effect on what happens in the future

sentences.english: There was a brief silence before anyone answered.
sentences.chinese: 沉默了片刻才有人回答。

sentences.english: ‘Silence in court!’ roared the judge.
sentences.chinese: “法庭上请保持肃静！”法官吼道。

sentences.english: The accused exercised his right to silence (= the legal right to choose to say nothing ) .
sentences.chinese: 被告行使了沉默权。

sentences.english: She held up her hand to silence the children.
sentences.chinese: 她抬手示意孩子们安静下来。

detailed_translations.english: complete quiet because nobody is talking
to make someone stop talking, or stop something making a noise

sentences.english: The large house was silent and lonely.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大房子寂静荒凉。

sentences.english: At last the guns fell silent .
sentences.chinese: 枪声终于沉寂了下来。

sentences.english: Julie offered up a silent prayer that she would pass her exam.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉默默地祈祷，希望能通过这次考试。

sentences.english: Alan was silent.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦沉默不语。

detailed_translations.english: without any sound, or not making any sound

sentences.english: Stop asking silly questions.
sentences.chinese: 别再问傻问题了。

sentences.english: You made a lot of silly mistakes .
sentences.chinese: 你犯了许多愚蠢的错误。

sentences.english: I left my keys at home, which was a pretty silly thing to do .
sentences.chinese: 我干了件傻事，把钥匙落在家里了。

sentences.english: ‘Shall we go for a walk?’ ‘ Don’t be silly , it’s dark.’
sentences.chinese: “我们去散步吧？”“别犯傻了，天都黑了。”

detailed_translations.english: not sensible, or showing bad judgment

sentences.english: The silver spoon tarnished.
sentences.chinese: 银匙失去光泽了。

sentences.english: Her teeth were capped with silver.
sentences.chinese: 她的牙齿是包了银的。

sentences.english: The workers parted gold from silver in the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 在车间里工人们把金子从银子中提炼出来。

sentences.english: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.chinese: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.english: The two products look quite similar .
sentences.chinese: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

detailed_translations.english: almost the same

sentences.english: Completing the race is not just a simple matter of physical fitness.
sentences.chinese: 跑完比赛不仅仅是纯粹的体力问题。

sentences.english: I’m afraid Luke’s a bit simple.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得卢克有点笨。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that only one thing is involved

sentences.english: Please accept my sincere apologies .
sentences.chinese: 请接受我真诚的道歉。

sentences.english: his sincere desire to find out the truth
sentences.chinese: 他想查明真相的真切愿望

detailed_translations.english: a feeling, belief, or statement that is sincere is honest and true, and based on what you really feel and believe

sentences.english: We’ve been waiting here since two o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 我们从两点钟开始就在这里等了。

sentences.english: I haven’t played rugby since I left university.
sentences.chinese: 我大学毕业后就没打过橄榄球。

sentences.english: She left London ten years ago, and I haven’t seen her since.
sentences.chinese: 她十年前离开伦敦，此后我再没有见过她。

sentences.english: The factory has been here since the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂从 20 世纪 70 年代起就在这里了。

sentences.english: It was exactly five years since her father had died.
sentences.chinese: 从她父亲去世到现在正好满五年。

sentences.english: Since the end of the war, over five thousand prisoners have been released.
sentences.chinese: 自从战争结束以后，已有五千多名战俘获释。

sentences.english: He lost his job five years ago, but has since found other work.
sentences.chinese: 他五年前失去工作，但此后找到了其他工作。

sentences.english: I left school in 1995, and since then I’ve lived in London.
sentences.chinese: 我 1995 年离开学校，此后就在伦敦生活。

sentences.english: About six thousand people were arrested, several hundred of whom have since been released.
sentences.chinese: 约六千人被逮捕，不过他们中有几百人后来被释放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

detailed_translations.english: from a particular time or event in the past until the present, or in that period of time
When you are talking about an event or situation in the past, you use since to indicate that another event happened at some point later in time

sentences.english: A single tree gave shade from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 唯有一棵树遮阴。

sentences.english: They won the game by a single point.
sentences.chinese: 他们仅以一分的优势赢得比赛。

sentences.english: the highest price ever paid for a single work of art
sentences.chinese: 为单件艺术品所支付的最高价格

sentences.english: a single-sex school
sentences.chinese: 单一性别的学校

detailed_translations.english: only one
a ticket for a trip from one place to another but not back again

sentences.english: Their motorboat struck a rock and began to sink.
sentences.chinese: 他们的摩托艇触了礁，开始下沉。

sentences.english: The kids watched as the coin sank to the bottom of the pool.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们看着那枚硬币沉到池底。

sentences.english: The heavy guns sank up to their barrels in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 这些沉重的大炮深陷在泥里，只露出炮管。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下沉，沉没；降低，下落；陷入；衰退，恶化
detailed_translations.english: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使下沉，使沉没；降低；掘，挖，凿
detailed_translations.english: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 水槽， 水池， 洗涤槽
detailed_translations.english: a large open container that you fill with water and use for washing yourself, washing dishes etc

sentences.english: an archaeological site
sentences.chinese: 考古现场

detailed_translations.english: a place where something important or interesting happened
to place or build something in a particular place

sentences.english: The house is in a charming situation, on a wooded hillside.
sentences.chinese: 房子位于林木茂密的小山坡上，环境十分优美。

detailed_translations.english: the type of area where a building is situated - used especially by people who sell or advertise buildings

sentences.english: He’s a small boy, about John’s size.
sentences.chinese: 他是个小男孩，个子和约翰差不多。

sentences.chinese: 发起人必须真正认可项目的价值，这一点很重要，只有这样才能确保在推广没有立即见效时资金和支持不会随之消失。

sentences.chinese: 在这个示例中，我们将使用所有方法中最直截了当的一种 — 将对象引用写入一个文件，该 文件将由客户机选取。

sentences.chinese: 小孩子千万不要同陌生人说话。

sentences.chinese: 泪水顺着他们的脸颊流下来。

sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，我们搬到了中心大街。

sentences.chinese: 她的住处就在几条街外。

sentences.chinese: 我继续沿着马路走。

sentences.chinese: 街对面有人刚刚搬进来。

sentences.chinese: 我们的友谊逐年加深。

sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫的反对反而坚定了她继续下去的决心。

sentences.chinese: 该公司计划在西班牙设立办事处，以此增强在欧洲的实力。

sentences.english: Carl sat up in bed, yawned, and stretched.

detailed_translations.english: a continuous period of time

sentences.english: a strict teacher
sentences.chinese: 严格的老师

detailed_translations.english: expecting people to obey rules or to do what you say

sentences.chinese: 政府承诺，如消防员罢工，就将调军队来协助。

sentences.chinese: 显著的贫富差异

sentences.chinese: 那些统计数据最显著的特征是高自杀率。

sentences.english: He was a big strong man.
sentences.chinese: 他高大健壮。

sentences.chinese: 杰克又高又壮。

sentences.chinese: 已推行一种新的管理结构。

sentences.chinese: 你说这么多东西你怎么装进车里？

sentences.english: I felt sorry for the ones who had to eat the awful stuff.
sentences.chinese: 我很同情那些只能吃这种难吃东西的人。

sentences.english: Where’s all the camping stuff?

detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about things such as substances, materials, or groups of objects when you do not know what they are called, or it is not important to say exactly what they are

sentences.chinese: 将日本的管理方式用于欧洲企业的尝试

detailed_translations.english: a particular way of doing, designing, or producing something, especially one that is typical of a particular place, period of time, or group of people
to design clothing, furniture, or the shape of someone’s hair in a particular way

sentences.english: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.english: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.

sentences.chinese: 树叶上覆着一层黏糊糊的怪东西。

sentences.english: The substance of his argument was that people on welfare should work.
sentences.chinese: 他论点的主旨是享受社会福利的人应该去工作。

name: substitute
trans: n.代用品,代理人 v.(for)代替,替换

sentences.english: Germany brought on a substitute at half time.
sentences.chinese: 德国队在比赛半场时换上一名替补队员。

sentences.english: substitute goalkeeper

sentences.english: a kid from the suburbs

detailed_translations.english: an area where people live which is away from the centre of a town or city

sentences.english: The experiment was a big success.
sentences.chinese: 实验非常成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物
detailed_translations.english: when you achieve what you want or intend

sentences.english: The operation was successful.
sentences.chinese: 手术成功了。

sentences.english: a highly successful (= very successful ) meeting
sentences.chinese: 十分成功的会议

detailed_translations.english: achieving what you wanted, or having the effect or result you intended

sentences.english: She wanted to be the first woman to climb Mount Qomolangma, and she almost succeeded.
sentences.chinese: 她本想成为第一位登上珠穆朗玛峰的女性，而且差一点就成功了。

detailed_translations.english: to do what you tried or wanted to do
to be the next person to take a position or job after someone else

name: such
trans: adj.这样的，如此的 pron.这样的人或事

sentences.english: How dared they do such a thing?
sentences.chinese: 他们怎么敢做出这样的事?

sentences.english: He would not succumb to such an item.
sentences.chinese: 他不会对这样的条款做出让步的。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you think that something is not good enough or that there is not enough of it

sentences.english: I suddenly realized that there was someone following me.
sentences.chinese: 我突然意识到有人跟着我。

sentences.english: George died very suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 乔治死得非常突然。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the eagle opened its wings.
sentences.chinese: 突然，鹰展开翅膀。

detailed_translations.english: quickly and unexpectedly

sentences.chinese: 至少他死得突然，没有遭罪。

sentences.english: She’s suffering a lot of pain.

detailed_translations.english: to experience physical or mental pain

sentences.chinese: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.chinese: 有人提议，如果再有球员被出售，球队主教练就辞职。

sentences.english: Any suggestions would be welcome.
sentences.chinese: 任何建议都欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: an idea, plan, or possibility that someone mentions, or the act of mentioning it

name: suit
trans: n.一套衣服 v.适合，中...的意

sentences.english: Johnson has filed suit against her.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊对她提起了诉讼。

sentences.english: a civil suit
sentences.chinese: 民事诉讼

sentences.english: There are countryside walks to suit everyone.
sentences.chinese: 有适合每个人的乡村步行路径。

sentences.english: We are hoping to find a suitable school.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望能找到一所合适的学校。

detailed_translations.english: having the right qualities for a particular person, purpose, or situation

sentences.english: We tour by car every summer.
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.english: Food must be refrigerated in summer.
sentences.chinese: 食物在夏天必须加以冷藏。

sentences.chinese: 经过一个夏天， 连最差的牛羊在这里也长得又肥又壮了。

sentences.english: The sky was blue and the sun was shining.
sentences.chinese: 天空蔚蓝，阳光明媚。

sentences.english: What are you doing Sunday?
sentences.chinese: 你星期天做什么？

detailed_translations.english: the day between Saturday and Monday

sentences.english: a warm sunny day
sentences.chinese: 温暖晴朗的一天

sentences.english: a sunny morning
sentences.chinese: 艳阳高照的上午

sentences.english: a nice sunny room
sentences.chinese: 阳光充足的房间

sentences.english: I hope it’s sunny tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我希望明天天晴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of light from the sun

sentences.english: a picture of sunrise over Mount Fuji
sentences.chinese: 富士山日出的照片

detailed_translations.english: the time when the sun first appears in the morning

sentences.english: a glorious sunset
sentences.chinese: 壮丽的日落景象

detailed_translations.english: the time of day when the sun disappears and night begins

sentences.english: We had three days of spring sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 我们享受了三天的春日阳光。

detailed_translations.english: the light and heat that come from the sun when there is no cloud

sentences.chinese: 一辆状况极好的旧车

sentences.english: That sounds super.
sentences.chinese: 那听起来棒极了。

sentences.english: What a super idea!
sentences.chinese: 这个主意太妙了！

sentences.chinese: 她带着那种傲慢的语气。

sentences.chinese: 他的眼睛环视了一下超级市场。

sentences.chinese: 整个超级市场被一场大火烧掉。

sentences.chinese: 我们学校附近的那个超级市场不久将重新开业。

detailed_translations.english: a very large shop that sells food, drinks, and things that people need regularly in their homes

sentences.chinese: 这个国家的燃料供应不会无穷无尽。

sentences.chinese: 为保护食品供应，政府下令宰杀被感染的牛。

name: supplement
trans: n.补遗,增刊,附录 v.增刊,补充

sentences.chinese: 各种维生素和其他膳食补充剂

detailed_translations.chinese: 增补， 补充； 增刊， 副刊
detailed_translations.english: something that you add to something else to improve it or make it complete
to add something, especially to what you earn or eat, in order to increase it to an acceptable level

sentences.chinese: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.chinese: 死亡人数远远超过最初的预料。

sentences.chinese: 他那奇怪的问题令她感到意外。

sentences.chinese: 我不知道你们俩认识。 尽管如此，我并不感到意外。

sentences.chinese: 最令我感到意外的是，她好像毫不在乎。

sentences.english: The man had a look of surprise on his face.

sentences.chinese: 他怒视着围住帐篷的那些人。

trans: v.调查；测量 n.调查，测量

sentences.chinese: 被调查的 100 家公司中，10% 的公司营业额在 5,000 万到 9,900 万英镑之间。

sentences.chinese: 她转过头审视女儿苍白的面容。

sentences.chinese: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.chinese: 她在袭击中幸免于难。

sentences.chinese: 她非常怀疑他在对她撒谎。

sentences.english: She’s not going to be very happy about this, I suspect .

sentences.chinese: 他不愿回答我的问题，这引起我的怀疑。

sentences.chinese: 她向他投去怀疑的一瞥。

sentences.chinese: 你真是疑心太重！

sentences.chinese: 伊恩大汗淋漓地离开壁球场。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of warm wool or cotton clothing with long sleeves, which covers the top half of your body

sentences.chinese: 我的信很快就得到了回复。

sentences.english: She shot a swift glance at Paul.
sentences.chinese: 她迅速瞥了保罗一眼。

sentences.chinese: 今天下午我们游泳去吧。

sentences.english: kids learning to swim the backstroke
sentences.chinese: 学习仰泳的孩子们

sentences.english: She was the first woman to swim the Channel.
sentences.chinese: 她是第一个游过英吉利海峡的女性。

sentences.chinese: 我们向受害者家庭表示慰问。

sentences.chinese: 警报系统

sentences.english: a well-designed heating system
sentences.chinese: 设计良好的供暖系统

sentences.english: the digestive system
sentences.chinese: 消化系统

sentences.english: the railway system
sentences.chinese: 铁路系统

detailed_translations.chinese: 系统； 制度， 体制； 方法， 做法； 身体
detailed_translations.english: a group of related parts that work together as a whole for a particular purpose

sentences.english: The food was served on long tables.
sentences.chinese: 食物放在长餐桌上供应。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with a flat top supported by legs
to leave a bill etc to be discussed or dealt with in the future

sentences.english: Will you take the job?
sentences.chinese: 你接受这份工作吗？

sentences.english: Do you take American Express?
sentences.chinese: 你们接受美国运通信用卡吗？

sentences.chinese: 如果你听我的意见，就去看医生。

sentences.english: Our helpline take s 3.5 million calls (= telephone calls ) a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们的求助热线每年接听350万个电话。

sentences.english: Some doctors are unwilling to take new patients without a referral.
sentences.chinese: 有些医生不愿意接收没有转诊单的新病人。

sentences.english: Liz found his criticisms hard to take .
sentences.chinese: 利兹觉得他的批评很难接受。

sentences.english: I just can’t take any more (= can’t deal with a bad situation any longer ) .
sentences.chinese: 我再也受不了了。

sentences.chinese: 员工同意接受2%的降薪。

detailed_translations.english: to accept or choose something that is offered, suggested, or given to you

name: talk
trans: v.说话；交谈 n.聊天；谈话

sentences.english: I could hear Sarah and Andy talking in the next room.
sentences.chinese: 我听到萨拉和安迪在隔壁讲话。

sentences.english: Sue and Bob still aren’t talking (= are refusing to talk to each other ) .
sentences.chinese: 休和鲍勃仍然互不理睬。

detailed_translations.english: to say things to someone as part of a conversation
to say things to someone as part of a conversation

sentences.english: The water tank is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 水箱在漏水。

sentences.english: Somehow the chemical got from a storage tank into water supplies.
sentences.chinese: 不知怎么的，这种化学物从储存箱进入了供水系统。

sentences.english: the plane’s fuel tank
sentences.chinese: 飞机的油箱

detailed_translations.english: a large container for storing liquid or gas

sentences.english: There is no target date for completion of the new project.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的项目何时完工没有预定日期。

sentences.english: The government may fail to meet (= achieve ) its target of recycling 25% of domestic waste.
sentences.chinese: 政府可能达不到回收利用25%的生活垃圾的目标。

sentences.english: Jiang set annual growth targets of 8–9%.
sentences.chinese: 江确定了8%至9%的年增长目标。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying to achieve, such as a total, an amount, or a time
